schwaebische.de.113476.1: Biker reacts lighting-fast and prevents the worst
schwaebische.de.113476.2: On Friday evening, there was a traffic accident on the country road between Machtolsheim and Merklingen, where the motorcyclist only suffered minor injuries thanks to his quick reaction.
schwaebische.de.113476.4: A 44-year old car driver coming from Merklingen wanted to make a left turn onto country road 1230 towards Machtolsheim around 9:30 p.m. in her VW.
schwaebische.de.113476.5: She did not see the 24-year old motorcyclist coming from Nellingen who had the right of way.
schwaebische.de.113476.6: During the collision, the hand brake and foot brake lever flew off
schwaebische.de.113476.7: The biker tried to evade the car, but still hit the rear of the vehicle.
schwaebische.de.113476.8: Grazing the car caused the Suzuki’s hand and foot brake levers to be torn off and the driver was no longer able to brake.
schwaebische.de.113476.9: Alert, he steered his motorcycle into the median strip next to the roadway and let the motorcycle coast to a stop there.
schwaebische.de.113476.11: The biker did suffer a leg injury from the impact with the car and had to be treated at a hospital.
np-coburg.de.105627.1: Mamming: Coronavirus mass infections: 174 farmhands infected
np-coburg.de.105627.2: Following a coronavirus mass infection in a large vegetable farm in Mamming in lower Bavaria, nearly 500 people are under quarantine and not allowed to leave the farm.
np-coburg.de.105627.3: A security service is monitoring the confinement.
np-coburg.de.105627.4: A total of 174 farmhands tested positive for the coronavirus pathogen Sars-CoV-2 during mass testing, as the district office of Dingolfing-Landau announced on Saturday evening.
np-coburg.de.105627.5: “To prevent further spread, we unfortunately need to take this step to protect the population,” stated district administrator Werner Bumeder (CSU).
np-coburg.de.105627.6: Seven employees were previously infected on the farm - this was the reason for the mass testing.
np-coburg.de.105627.7: The business is a large vegetable farm, which cultivates raspberries, cucumbers, cabbages and beets - but the cucumbers are only for pickling jars.
np-coburg.de.105627.8: Mamming is a rural community with approximately 3,300 residents, not far from Dingolfing’s large BMW plant.
np-coburg.de.105627.9: Bumeder appealed to the citizens to stay calm: “According to our information, this is a closed group of people.”
np-coburg.de.105627.10: On the farm, infected employees were kept separated from non-infected employees, and the premises are now surrounded by a fence.
np-coburg.de.105627.11: The Green and SPD parties blamed the state government.
np-coburg.de.105627.12: The two opposing factions accused Minister-President Markus Söder (CSU) and his cabinet of failing to control the seasonal workers’ accommodation.
np-coburg.de.105627.13: “This could pay dearly if local infections like this spread and regional lockdowns have to be arranged,” said Jürgen Mistol, the parliamentary director of the Green Party.
np-coburg.de.105627.14: The SPD sees it very similarly: “After the coronavirus outbreak in the Wiesenhof butchery in mid-May, we called for a special control program, including for farms with seasonal workers,” said environmental expert Florian von Brunn.
np-coburg.de.105627.15: “The hygiene conditions in the workplace and the living conditions need to be heavily controlled, in our opinion.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.1: Aidenbachstrasse underground station: Dangerous brawl: 19-year old falls to track bed after being pushed
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.2: During an argument between two groups of youths at the Aidenbachstrasse underground station, a 19-year old was pushed to the ground and slipped into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.3: Obersendling - At around 4:15 p.m. on Friday, there was a quarrel between two groups of youths at Aidenbachstrasse underground station.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.4: A passer-by alerted the police, and a number of officers attended the scene.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.5: Initial inquiries indicate that a youth (17) from Munich pushed a 19-year old man to the floor.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.6: The young man then slipped over the edge of the platform and fell into the track bed.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.7: Members of the 17-year old’s group helped the man who had fallen to climb back on to the platform.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.8: There was no danger from an oncoming train.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.9: As reported by the police, the two young people then resumed their dispute.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.10: The 17-year old initially fled from the scene, but his identity was later verified.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.11: His father accompanied him to police station number 29.
abendzeitung-nuernberg.de.119238.12: The 17-year old is under investigation for causing bodily harm.
landeszeitung.de.13223.1: Report: Seehofer pushes for longer data retention
landeszeitung.de.13223.3: But according to a media report, the Federal Minister of the Interior, Horst Seehofer, is calling for an extension of the retention period.
landeszeitung.de.13223.4: His aim is to strengthen the fight against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.5: According to a media report, Federal Minister of the Interior Horst Seehofer (CSU) is calling for data retention to be extended - for six months rather than ten weeks.
landeszeitung.de.13223.6: As “Bild am Sonntag” reports, Seehofer asked Justice Minister Christine Lambrecht (SPD) for a quick change to the law in a letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.7: It reports that Seehofer’s intention is to strengthen measures against child abuse.
landeszeitung.de.13223.8: He believes it is a good idea “to make urgently required changes to the law now”, the paper quotes the letter.
landeszeitung.de.13223.10: An ECJ decision on it is still outstanding.
landeszeitung.de.13223.11: However, Seehofer wants the changes beforehand so that they can be applied immediately if the verdict is positive, the report goes on to say.
landeszeitung.de.13223.12: A Justice Ministry spokesman told the paper that they could only really look to see whether legal change is necessary once the courts have reached a decision.
landeszeitung.de.13223.13: In the fight against child abuse and child pornography, Seehofer and the federal states’ interior ministers had previously argued in favor of data retention back in June.
bild.255016.1: NBA: Strip club problem for Clippers star Lou Williams
bild.255016.3: Lou Williams (33), basketball pro with the Los Angeles Clippers, had supposedly left the tournament accommodation in Disney World in Orlando/Florida with permission to attend a funeral.
bild.255016.4: But according to US media reports, he visited the “Magic City” strip club in Atlanta that evening.
bild.255016.5: Williams, who, according to ESPN, has apparently admitted to the visit, is back in isolation and being tested every day for Covid-19.
bild.255016.6: The reason for his visit? Chicken wings.
bild.255016.7: Back in February last year, “Sweet Lou”, as he is known in the NBA, expressed his liking for those same wings.
bild.255016.8: The American wrote, "Magic City and Blue Flame (another strip club in Atlanta, Ed. ) have the best wings in the city”.
bild.255016.9: On Sunday NBA insider Shams Charania announced on Twitter that the NBA had ordered Williams to go into quarantine for ten days.
bild.255016.10: This means that the Clippers star will miss the first two official games after the test game phase.
bild.255016.11: The NBA is aiming to play out the coronavirus season in Disney World.
bild.255016.12: The best 22 teams are currently playing training games in preparation for the season finale which begins on Friday night.
np-coburg.de.105625.1: Söder makes a statement about coronavirus situation after mass infections
np-coburg.de.105625.2: Munich - Health Minister Melanie Huml (CSU) already announced a testing offensive for large farms on Sunday.
np-coburg.de.105625.3: The press conference can be viewed live on our homepage.
np-coburg.de.105625.4: The case in Mamming in the district of Dingolfing-Landau has frightened authorities and politicians.
np-coburg.de.105625.5: There are currently almost 500 harvesting workers from several countries working on the large vegetable farm, and over one third of them are infected with the coronavirus pathogen.
np-coburg.de.105625.6: The farm is now under quarantine and is blocked off with fencing.
np-coburg.de.105625.7: No one is allowed to leave the premises, food is being delivered.
np-coburg.de.105625.8: The authorities are now offering free coronavirus tests to the almost 3,300 residents of the municipality.
np-coburg.de.105625.9: Since the farmhands had little contact with the local population, the district office is currently assuming that the infections have not spread beyond the farm.
kurier.at.204625.1: “Pangs of conscience”: Confession of the alleged Nantes arsonist
kurier.at.204625.2: “My client has cooperated,” lawyer Quentin Chabert told the newspaper.
kurier.at.204625.3: The defense counsel added, “He very much regrets his actions, and his confession came as a relief to him”.
kurier.at.204625.4: His client was “plagued by pangs of conscience and upset by the extent of the damage”.
kurier.at.204625.5: The prosecution service say that, if he is convicted, the man faces ten years in prison and a 150,000 euro fine.
kurier.at.204625.6: Last Saturday night, the Gothic St Peter and St Paul Cathedral in Nantes was severely damaged by a fire.
kurier.at.204625.7: The fire broke out at three separate locations in the church.
kurier.at.204625.8: Laboratory investigations firmed up the suspicion of arson.
kurier.at.204625.9: The suspect now in custody was detained just hours after the fire.
kurier.at.204625.10: But after a day he was released.
kurier.at.204625.11: The man works for the Nantes diocese in a voluntary capacity and he was responsible for locking up the cathedral on the evening before the fire.
kurier.at.204625.12: As there was no evidence of forced entry into the church, he quickly came under the scrutiny of the investigators.
infranken.de.309597.2: Former DFB President Reinhard Grindel has recommended thought be given to scrapping the 50+1 rule.
infranken.de.309597.3: “German football should at least discuss setting conditions and clear rules for investors before the EU Commission creates any fait accompli,” Grindel told “Bild am Sonntag”.
infranken.de.309597.4: He said, “In any case the 50+1 rules don’t work for those clubs that are most likely to threaten Bayern and Dortmund - look at Leipzig or Leverkusen.
infranken.de.309597.5: In any case, you can’t get around the debate as to whether it shouldn’t be made easier for clubs that are aiming to break into this grouping to engage investors.
infranken.de.309597.6: But he doubts whether there is a willingness within the German football league to allow majority shareholdings which are prohibited by the 50+1 rule in the Bundesliga.
infranken.de.309597.7: “There is a legal risk involved in putting up investment barriers around the Bundesliga as a business hub in a European internal market,” said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.8: The former DFB boss sees a danger that “the attempts to create a greater competitive balance in the Bundesliga could, in the end, merely weaken the competitiveness of our top clubs at European level, but not lead to more suspense in the championship”.
infranken.de.309597.9: Even evenly distributing TV monies will not have any decisive effect.
infranken.de.309597.10: “FC Bayern have revenues of 750 million euros, Borussia Dortmund 500 million and RB Leipzig 300 million.
infranken.de.309597.11: So even between the top three clubs there are immense differences.
infranken.de.309597.12: The other 15 clubs have an average budget of 130 million,” explained the 58 year old.
infranken.de.309597.14: “Unfortunately, there were individuals who noticed that error and went to the press rather than speak to me about it,” said Grindel about his acceptance of an expensive watch, which led to his resignation in April 2019.
infranken.de.309597.15: “On a human level, that hurt me a lot”.
infranken.de.309597.16: He had received the gift, valued at around 11,000 euros, from a Ukrainian functionary.
infranken.de.309597.17: “I committed a compliance violation and it was right to accept the consequences,” said Grindel.
infranken.de.309597.18: “I was completely transparent and honest about the dubious gift of the watch.
infranken.de.309597.19: Many people at the DFB knew about it”.
infranken.de.309597.20: He had never “made any secret of the gift”, affirmed the 58 year old.
infranken.de.309597.21: “You might call that naive, but this type of transparency was the complete opposite of corruption”.
faz.79601.1: "Black Lives Matter": Casualties and one dead
faz.79601.2: In the United States there has been an upsurge in protests against police violence as a result of Donald Trump’s deployment of federal police in several cities.
faz.79601.3: There were clashes between demonstrators and police in various cities on Saturday.
faz.79601.4: Three people were injured in Louisville, while 16 people were detained in Seattle.
faz.79601.5: In Austin, one person was fatally shot as a demonstration was crossing a junction.
faz.79601.6: There had also been clashes during protests against racism and police violence in Portland previously.
faz.79601.7: On Saturday night the security forces, including federal police agents, deployed tear gas and dispersed demonstrators with force.
faz.79601.8: On Saturday hundreds of demonstrators, some armed, marched through Louisville in Kentucky and demanded that those responsible for the death of Breonna Taylor be held to account.
faz.79601.9: In March, the 26 year old student was shot in her apartment in Louisville during a drug raid.
faz.79601.10: The raid was targeting someone else who did not even live there, and no drugs were found.
faz.79601.11: On Saturday, when a member of a group calling itself the Armed Coalition of Black Americans fired a shot, three people were wounded.
faz.79601.12: According to broadcaster NBC, they were taken to hospital.
faz.79601.13: None of them was in a life-threatening condition.
faz.79601.14: The police formed barricades because counter-demonstrators from a white militia had also gathered.
faz.79601.15: In the end, the two groups did not clash.
faz.79601.16: In Austin, Texas, a person in a “Black Lives Matter” march was shot and killed.
faz.79601.17: According to some reports, the police have taken a suspect into custody.
faz.79601.18: They have not yet provided any further details about the circumstances surrounding the incident.
faz.79601.19: According to the New York Times, Mayor Steve Adler stated that, like many people in the city, he was “heartbroken and stunned” by what had happened.
faz.79601.20: On Saturday, demonstrators also clashed with police in the American city of Seattle.
faz.79601.21: They set fire to construction trailers in front of a youth detention center, and the police deployed flashbangs and pepper spray.
faz.79601.22: The “Seattle Times” reported that 16 people were detained for resisting police or for bodily harm.
faz.79601.23: A court building was set on fire in the city of Oakland in California.
faz.79601.24: A small group of demonstrators smashed windows, set off fireworks and blinded police officers with lasers, the Oakland police reported late on Saturday evening (local time).
faz.79601.26: In Aurora, a suburb of Denver in Colorado, a car drove through a crowd of people who were demonstrating on a freeway.
faz.79601.27: As the police reported, one of the demonstrators fired a weapon, and at least one person was injured and taken to hospital.
faz.79601.28: There, too, windows in a court building were smashed and a fire was started, police reported.
infranken.de.309607.1: Rakoczi in Bad Kissingen: Historic costumes despite virus
infranken.de.309607.2: Even though the spa town lacked the big party atmosphere, both visitors and performers enjoyed the flair of the alternative Rakoczi program.
infranken.de.309607.3: It was unusual for visitors, performers and organisers alike. The Rakoczi weekend with no Rakoczi party.
infranken.de.309607.4: However, even if the big party was absent from the town center, many people still got to enjoy the alternative, Covid-compliant program, including the crowds of people and highlights such as the Saale burning, the Rakoczi ball and the parade.
infranken.de.309607.5: “I think we succeeded in creating plenty of Rakoczi flair,” said Spa Manager Sylvie Thormann.
infranken.de.309607.6: It went down well with the guests.
infranken.de.309607.7: In principle, it was a return to the beginnings of the Rakoczi Festival, when everything focused on the historic aspects.
infranken.de.309607.9: Vesna Konhäuser has been attending the Rakoczi Festival in Bad Kissingen with her husband for over 25 years.
infranken.de.309607.10: She did so in this Covid year, too.
infranken.de.309607.11: The couple settled down at the Luitpold Casino, watched the historic characters promenade, and listened to live Cuban music from the casino’s restaurant.
infranken.de.309607.12: “I’m think it’s still really pleasant like this,” said Konhäuser.
infranken.de.309607.13: She wasn’t missing the crowds of people which are usually associated with the Rakoczi.
infranken.de.309607.14: However, she was missing the usual program highlights, particularly the burning Saale on Friday evening, the historic parad,e and the closing firework display on Sunday evening.
infranken.de.309607.16: The weather was absolutely spot-on this year,” she felt.
infranken.de.309607.17: Rakoczi horse show to be held again
infranken.de.309607.18: For some of those portraying the historic spa guests, the alternative program meant more work.
infranken.de.309607.19: For example, for Christina Gold who, in a normal year, takes part in the parade where she can be seen on the spa garden cafe’s carriage.
infranken.de.309607.20: This year she spent Saturday and Sunday walking around town in her costume.
infranken.de.309607.21: “It’s certainly more effort, we usually have things easier,” she said.
infranken.de.309607.22: The riding club had less to do, even though a few riders were trotting around the park.
infranken.de.309607.23: “We really hope that the riders’ quadrille will be held again next year,” said President Ulrike Waldhofen.
infranken.de.309607.24: She said that a Rakoczi horse show would also be held again in 2021 after a hiatus of several years.
morgenpost.de.276358.1: 28 coronavirus cases at Spanish second division club Fuenlabrada
morgenpost.de.276358.2: Spanish second division football club Fuenlabrada is slipping ever deeper into a crisis due to a coronavirus outbreak.
morgenpost.de.276358.3: One blow has followed another since the newcomer from near Madrid flew to a game in the city of A Coruña on 20th July despite some cases of coronavirus.
morgenpost.de.276358.4: By Sunday 28 players or team members had tested positive, with one hospitalized, the club reported.
morgenpost.de.276358.5: Until now Fuenlabrada, from the eponymous town south-west of Madrid, had had a chance of reaching the promotion playoffs.
morgenpost.de.276358.6: Now they are even threatened with relegation to the second division’s B Group.
morgenpost.de.276358.7: The match against Deportivo La Coruña last Monday was canceled at the last moment, the public prosecutor was investigating a possible offence against public health, and the leading sports authority, the CSD, was considering imposing relegation on the club.
morgenpost.de.276358.8: The players and other team members are in quarantine in a hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.9: “They were given no fresh towels and no shower gel until their sixth day of quarantine,” wrote sports paper “AS”.
morgenpost.de.276358.10: Photos show that players have hung up underwear and club clothing in their hotel rooms after apparently having had to wash them themselves.
morgenpost.de.276358.11: Neither had the bedding been washed for five days.
morgenpost.de.276358.13: It is neither good nor enough,” wrote “AS”.
morgenpost.de.276358.14: The club’s management stated that they are satisfied with the hotel.
morgenpost.de.276358.15: The club’s lawyer, Javier Tebas Llanas, hit back at the accusation that they had committed an offence against public health.
morgenpost.de.276358.16: Javier Tebas, who is the son of the President of Spain’s Primera Liga, said that they had not contravened the football association’s coronavirus regulations, reported news agency Europa Press and sports paper “Marca”.
morgenpost.de.276358.17: Before flying, four people had been infected prior to 19th July, and they had all isolated and did not travel.
morgenpost.de.276358.18: All the players and team members were retested immediately before the flight to A Coruña.
morgenpost.de.276358.19: Once the team was in A Coruña “five or six” more team members then tested positive for coronavirus.
morgenpost.de.276358.20: The game was cancelled 60 minutes before kick-off, said Tebas Llanas.
mainpost.de.409271.1: Police forced to catch runaway horses near Dampfach
mainpost.de.409271.2: Two animals had got onto the road.
mainpost.de.409271.3: The police led them back to their owner.
mainpost.de.409271.4: Shortly before 6 am on Sunday morning, a road user reported that there were two runaway horses on the slip road between the Donnersdorf/Steinsfeld junction and the Theres motorway access.
mainpost.de.409271.5: When the officers arrived, the horses were between the slip road and the village of Dampfach once more.
mainpost.de.409271.6: Once the officers had gained the horses’ trust near Dampfach, they allowed a rope that had been brought in the patrol car to be placed around them.
azonline.de.86610.1: Cyclist Tony Martin: May extend career
azonline.de.86610.2: Time trial specialist Tony Martin is considering extending his career.
azonline.de.86610.3: Frankfurt/Main - Seven time world champion time trialist Tony Martin can certainly see himself continuing his cycling career.
azonline.de.86610.4: “At the moment I’m talking with the team to work out exactly how we can continue,” the 35-year old told the "Frankfurter Allgemeine Sonntagszeitung".
azonline.de.86610.5: Martin is currently employed by Dutch team Jumbo-Visma and, prior to the coronavirus break, he had been thinking about ending his career after this year.
azonline.de.86610.6: The negotiations with his team include discussing the number of race days, he said.
azonline.de.86610.7: Plus other issues that would affect him as a father, he added.
azonline.de.86610.8: After falling, he used to get up and his first thought was, “Get back on the bike quickly!
azonline.de.86610.9: Now, as th father of a little girl, I think: what if?”.
azonline.de.86610.10: Martin admitted that there are issues that he finds increasingly difficult.
azonline.de.86610.11: “But it did me good, during the virus, to see what I’ve got from cycling and how much I enjoy it”.
azonline.de.86610.12: The time trial specialist’s next race will be the Tour de l'Ain (5th to 9th August).
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.1: Bavaria: At least four dead on Bavaria’s roads at the weekend
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.2: The fine weather drew bikers onto the roads in many places.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.3: For at least three people, their bike ride ended in death.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.4: An 18 year old pedestrian was also killed.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.5: Schönthal - Several people, mostly young, died on Bavaria’s roads at the weekend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.6: Near Schönthal (Cham rural district) on Sunday, an 18 year old woman riding a motorbike was hit by an oncoming car that crossed into her lane.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.7: Why the vehicle strayed into her lane was initially unclear.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.8: In Upper Bavaria on Saturday, a 22 year old on a bike collided with a horse-drawn carriage.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.9: According to police, he was riding downhill near Beilngries.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.10: He collided with the carriage on a left-hand bend.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.11: His injuries were so severe that he died at the scene.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.12: Of the twelve occupants in the carriage, one man was seriously injured and one man sustained mild injuries, said the police.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.13: An 18 year old died in another fatal accident in Bad Kötzting, in Upper Palatinate.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.14: Late on Saturday night, he had lain down on a road and he was run over by a 42 year old driver.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.15: The police believe that the 18 year old was trying to sleep.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.16: The driver was unable to brake in time.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.17: On Saturday near Schönberg (Freyung-Grafenau rural district), a 57-year-old biker hit a car head-on on a right-hand bend despite braking hard.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.19: The 57 year old female driver suffered shock, while the other three people in the car were unhurt.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.20: Bavaria’s Transport Minister Kerstin Schreyer (CSU) touched on the subject of motorcyclist safety on Saturday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.21: In a letter to Gabor Kovacs, the organizer of the biker protests against driving bans which are planned for August, the Minister referred to substantial investments such as underride guards on crash barriers, and the straightening of dangerous bends.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.22: “We have done a lot for motorcyclist safety in recent years,” said the letter.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54331.23: “The number of motorcyclist fatalities has fallen by around 28 percent compared with 2011”.
freiepresse.de.254098.1: Kovac tested as Monaco play Frankfurt
freiepresse.de.254098.2: Frankfurt/Main (dpa) - Football coach Niko Kovac is soon to play against Eintracht Frankfurt again with his new club AS Monaco.
freiepresse.de.254098.3: The eight-time French champions are set to visit the Hesse outfit, the Croat’s previous club, on August 1st (6 p.m.).
freiepresse.de.254098.4: For the Bundesliga outfit, this is their one and only endurance test prior to their Europa League return against FC Basel (6th August).
freiepresse.de.254098.5: The match will go ahead without spectators due to the coronavirus pandemic.
freiepresse.de.254098.6: “We’re particularly looking forward to this game.
freiepresse.de.254098.7: It’s always nice to come to Frankfurt and meet up with friends,” explained Kovac.
freiepresse.de.254098.8: In sporting terms it would be a good test, said the 48 year old.
freiepresse.de.254098.9: Before switching to Bayern Munich, Kovac coached the Hesse club between 2016 and 2018 and led them to victory in the DFB Cup.
freiepresse.de.254098.10: “A quality opponent like Monaco is a good test for us with respect to the game against Basel.
freiepresse.de.254098.11: Like everyone at Frankfurt, I’m looking forward to seeing Niko Kovac again,” said Eintracht coach Adi Hütter.
freiepresse.de.254098.12: The 50 year old Austrian took over from the Croat at Eintracht.
freiepresse.de.254098.13: In March, Frankfurt lost the first leg of the quarter finals against Basel 0:3 in their own stadium.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.1: Nearly 50 new infections: The district of Hof has nearly finished lockdown
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.2: The number of known new coronavirus infections in the district of Hof increased again on the weekend: from 39 on Friday and 43 on Saturday (one person has recovered and is no longer included in this statistic) to 47 on Sunday.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.3: There is also one case in the city of Hof.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54332.4: This means that the area of Hof is reaching the critical mark of 50 new infections per 100,000 residents in a week.
euronews-de.199228.1: 700 killed by monsoon rains in South-East Asia
euronews-de.199228.2: Over 9 million people have been affected by the severe flooding in South-East Asia, particularly in Bangladesh, India and Nepal.
euronews-de.199228.3: In all, 700 people have died as a result of the strong monsoon rains.
euronews-de.199228.4: In Bangladesh, the Red Crescent are attempting to reach isolated people in boats.
euronews-de.199228.6: The farmers have lost their harvests.
euronews-de.199228.7: Indian rhinos die after landslide in national park
euronews-de.199228.8: Several of the 120 Indian rhinos in the Kaziranga National Park died as a result of a landslide.
euronews-de.199228.9: They are protected and considered to be under threat of extinction.
euronews-de.199228.10: This year the flooding is particularly bad, which scientists are attributing to climate change.
euronews-de.199228.11: According to United Nations data, Bangladesh is one of the countries most affected by global warming.
euronews-de.199228.13: In the city of Cox’s Bazar in southern Bangladesh, the state has built apartments for 650 people who have been driven out by the floods.
euronews-de.199228.14: Only a few have so far been occupied.
euronews-de.199228.15: It is difficult to get people to Cox’s Bazar.
euronews-de.199228.17: Those who used to own a house, albeit small and hut-like, often do not want to spend their lives in a large apartment building.
euronews-de.199228.18: Many of the apartments are vacant, but the government wants them to soon be occupied by those who have lost their house to the floods.
oe24.at.258757.1: 60 New Coronavirus Infections in one day in Vienna
oe24.at.258757.2: Over a 24-hour period, 60 new coronavirus infections were reported in Vienna - there were 22 new infections in Lower Austria.
oe24.at.258757.3: The Vienna Regional Directorate of Public Health and the Medical Crisis Staff of the City of Vienna provide regular updates about the current case numbers and other figures about the Covid-19 virus. As of Sunday July 26, 2020, 8:00 am, 4,840 (+60) positive tests have been confirmed in Vienna.
oe24.at.258757.4: The number of deaths associated with the virus remains unchanged at 204.
oe24.at.258757.6: 22 new coronavirus infections in Lower Austria
oe24.at.258757.7: The number of coronavirus infections in Lower Austria rose by 22 to 3,288 on Sunday.
oe24.at.258757.8: One infected person has recovered, according to the medical staff.
oe24.at.258757.9: This increases the number of recovered people to 2,936.
oe24.at.258757.10: 247 patients in the state were currently ill from Covid-19.
oe24.at.258757.11: 147,253 tests have been carried out to date.
oe24.at.258757.12: 105 people have died in connection with the lung disease.
handelsblatt.com.292809.2: The new claim could not be settled, the Finance Ministry in Buenos Aires stated on Saturday.
handelsblatt.com.292809.3: “It would be not just irresponsible, but unjust too,” a statement explained.
handelsblatt.com.292809.4: “While 50 percent of children in Argentina are living in poverty, we cannot increase our creditors’ short-term profits”.
handelsblatt.com.292809.5: The debts of the second-largest national economy in South America are no longer sustainable under the current terms.
handelsblatt.com.292809.6: As a result, Argentina is asking its private creditors to waive some of their claims of around 66 billion US Dollars (about 59 billion euros).
handelsblatt.com.292809.7: Should no agreement be reached, the country will once again be threatened with bankruptcy.
handelsblatt.com.292809.8: That would be the ninth debt default in Argentina’s history.
handelsblatt.com.292809.9: Creditors have recently demanded higher interest rates on government securities, and changes to some contractual clauses.
handelsblatt.com.292809.10: However, the Argentinian government is sticking to its last offer and is not prepared to make any further concessions.
handelsblatt.com.292809.11: Argentina is in the middle of a severe financial and economic crisis.
handelsblatt.com.292809.12: The inflation rate was recently above 50 percent.
handelsblatt.com.292809.13: Experts are expecting a decline in economic output of around ten percent this year.
handelsblatt.com.292809.14: In late May, Argentina failed to make interest payments of 503 million US Dollars, so it slipped into partial debt default.
pnp.de.390078.2: “It’s going really well” Dr. Stefanie Kramer drew this conclusion after her first days in the notary’s office in Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.3: In the end, everything happened very quickly: In Mid-May, Dr. Stefanie Kramer learned that she was taking Lutz Feller’s old position in the Eggenfelden notary’s office.
pnp.de.390078.4: Six weeks later, in early July, the doctor of law began work, and normal daily business has been at full speed for a while.
pnp.de.390078.5: “However, I still have to arrive personally,” she says in a conversation with the Rottaler Anzeiger and laughs.
pnp.de.390078.6: Of course the short lead time was not enough to time to completely move the center of her life from Regensburg to Eggenfelden, reports the Dingolfing native.
pnp.de.390078.7: She is currently searching for a suitable apartment or house in the city with her husband, who works in Regensburg as a judge on the district court.
pnp.de.390078.8: At least her husband was able to apply for short-term parental leave to be able to ensure their two daughters (3½ and 1½ years old) are cared for.
pnp.de.390078.9: So as not to have to commute from Regensburg every day, she can stay with her parents in Dingolfing for now, says the 39 year old.
pnp.de.390078.10: Having grown up in the neighboring district, she is of course very familiar with the city of Eggenfelden.
pnp.de.390078.11: When visiting on site with her family in recent months, she once again noticed: “Eggenfelden is a really nice little city.”
pnp.de.390078.12: So she was all the more happy when she found out she had won the race for the position in the selection procedure.
pnp.de.390078.13: Even in Dr. Stefanie Kramer’s professional career, her home of Lower Bavaria plays a key role: After studying law in Passau, she completed her legal clerkship and 2nd state examination in Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.14: After several stops as a notary public, including in Rehau and Hof in Upper Franconia, Babenhausen in Unterallgäu and Regensburg - during this time she also shouldered her doctorate in labor law “on the side” - she started her first position as a notary in Rotthalmünster in the district of Passau in 2012.
pnp.de.390078.15: In 2016, she went on parental leave, this was finally followed by the move to Regensburg.
pnp.de.390078.16: Since then she has been doing representative services in various notary offices.
pnp.de.390078.17: When the position in Eggenfelden opened up due to the approaching retirement of Lutz Feller, she saw it as the right time to make the full re-entry into her career, says the 39-year old.
pnp.de.390078.18: Dr. Stefanie Kramer has completely taken over the predecessor’s team, who will in the future take over the notary’s office for vacation representation - and already has praise for the office’s team: “It’s going really well!”
pnp.de.390078.19: The fact that she can rely on the smooth-running processes makes it easier for her to take care of the upcoming relocation of her private life.
pnp.de.390078.20: In terms of kindergarten or daycare places, she has already contacted the local facilities.
pnp.de.390078.21: And if everything goes as she hopes, she will be able to pursue her hobby here as well - and get to know the best jogging routes in the Rottal.
an-online.de.487062.1: BVB plans for up to 15,000 fans when new season opens
an-online.de.487062.2: Dortmund Germany’s largest football stadium, in Dortmund, will not even be 20 percent full at the start of next season should fans return.
an-online.de.487062.3: “Because of the rules on distancing we have to comply with, we are currently planning for between 12,000 and 15,000 fans”, Borussia Dortmund director Carsten Cramer told "Tagesspiegel".
an-online.de.487062.4: The Dortmund arena normally holds a little over 81,000 spectators for Bundesliga games.
an-online.de.487062.5: Last season BVB lost around four million euros per match as games were played behind closed doors due to the coronavirus pandemic.
an-online.de.487062.6: Cramer, who is Head of Marketing, Digitalization and Internationalization at BVB, is hoping that they will be able to open up some of the approximately 4,000 seats in the hospitality area, as well as the normal seats. “Of course, it’s a financial blow if all of this revenue is lost.”
an-online.de.487062.7: Given the ongoing Covid-19 crisis, everyone would be “well advised to adopt a recovery position to begin with”.
an-online.de.487062.8: “If a lot companies are having difficulties and 6.8 million people are working reduced hours in Germany alone, the need for entertainment is limited,” explained Cramer.
an-online.de.487062.9: The Dortmund marketing boss praised the BVB players for giving up part of their salary in order to help get through the crisis, “Of course, the players know that giving up their salaries has a different effect than if we reduce the working hours of 100 people in merchandising.”
kurier.at.204565.1: Tiny miracles: Early life start at only a couple hundred grams
kurier.at.204565.2: Scarcely heavier than a packet of butter, just three tablespoons of blood in his entire body. That was Gabriel when he was born - he weighed precisely 273 grams.
kurier.at.204565.3: The tot is one of around 400 premature babies that the Graz Children’s Hospital cares for each year.
kurier.at.204565.4: A quarter of them weigh less than 1,500 grams, while a couple, such as Gabriel and his brothers Raphael and Michael, are extreme lightweights whose birth weight is not even a kilogram.
kurier.at.204565.5: They are so small and born so early that their lungs, intestines and muscles are not fully formed.
kurier.at.204565.6: Their skin is sometimes so tender that an ECG’s electrodes can damage it.
kurier.at.204565.7: And they are so tiny that, for a while, they wear dolls’ clothing and diapers specially made for them.
kurier.at.204565.8: But not so small that they have no voice - “And how!”, smiles Berndt Urlesberger.
kurier.at.204565.9: “Even though they don’t cry as loudly as large babies, of course”.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.1: When the whiteboard becomes the stage
schwaebische-post.de.62177.2: Theater in the classroom despite the coronavirus: The 9th grade class of the St. Jakobus High School in Abtsgmünd found out just before the start of the holidays that the white board can be experienced as a stage.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.3: Actress Julia Sylvester from the city theater in Aalen put on the production “Das Heimatkleid” for students - by video, in fact.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.4: The students were then able to talk with the actress and director Winfried Tobias about the piece and the performance afterwards via Skype.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.5: The idea for the performance format was borne out of the current coronavirus situation.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.6: Teacher Teresa Nar was pleased with the enrichment to her teaching.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.7: Even though all of the participants agreed at the end that the direct encounter in the theater, and on stage, would be more appealing, potential for contact in schools can also be seen in the theater.
schwaebische-post.de.62177.8: “If we continue to improve the technical framework, it could be an interesting supplement to productions,” emphasized director Winfried Tobias.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.1: First Round draw: TSV 1860 to meet Eintracht Frankfurt in the DFB Cup
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.2: If TSV 1860 qualify for the DFB Cup, the Lions will face Eintracht Frankfurt in the first round.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.3: This was the outcome of Sunday’s draw.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.4: Munich 1860’s potential opponent in the first round of the DFB Cup is now known.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.5: If the Lions qualify they will face Eintracht Frankfurt.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.6: This was the outcome of the draw in the ARD sports show on Sunday evening.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.7: As the participants have not yet been finalized due to the coronavirus pandemic, the draw made use of placeholders.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.8: As semi-final opponents FC Memmingen have voluntarily withdrawn, TSV 1860 are already in the final of the Bavarian Cup (4th or 5th September).
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.9: There the Lions will face either the Würzburger Kickers or Viktoria Aschaffenburg.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.10: If Würzburg, who were recently promoted to Division 2 of the Bundesliga, reach the final, 1860 would already qualify for the first round of the DFB Cup.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.11: Otherwise the Giesing-based club would need to defeat regional league team Aschaffenburg in the final.
abendzeitung-muenchen.de.275242.12: The first round of the DFB Cup will be played between September 11 and 14, a week before the Bundesliga Division 3 season begins.
mz-web.de.376296.1: “Gone With The Wind”: Film legend Olivia de Havilland dies
mz-web.de.376296.2: Film legend and Oscar winner Olivia de Havilland has died.
mz-web.de.376296.3: She died of natural causes on Sunday in Paris at the age of 104, her spokeswoman told the Deutsche Presse agency.
mz-web.de.376296.4: de Havilland was known for her role as Melanie Hamilton in the southern states epic “Gone With The Wind” (1939).
mz-web.de.376296.5: Born in Tokyo to British parents, de Havilland moved to California as a young child.
mz-web.de.376296.6: Austrian dramatist Max Reinhardt discovered the 19 year old playing the role of Hermia in Shakespeare’s “Midsummer Night’s Dream”.
mz-web.de.376296.7: The Warner Brothers film studio immediately took her under contract for seven years and made her famous alongside Errol Flynn.
mz-web.de.376296.8: She made eight films with the heart-throb.
mz-web.de.376296.9: In 1946 she won her first Oscar with the leading role in "To Each His Own".
mz-web.de.376296.10: In Germany the film ran under the title “Mutterherz”.
mz-web.de.376296.11: Three years later came the Best Actress award for her role in William Wyler’s "The Heiress".
mz-web.de.376296.12: She also won great acclaim as a neurotic eccentric in “The Dark Mirror” and “The Snake Pit”.
mz-web.de.376296.13: In 1952 Daphne du Maurier suggested her for the leading role in the adaptation of her novel “My Cousin Rachel”.
mz-web.de.376296.14: The film was a worldwide success.
mz-web.de.376296.15: In “Hush...Hush, Sweet Charlotte” she acted alongside her old friend Bette Davis.
mz-web.de.376296.16: Her marriage to novelist Marcus Goodrich (1946 to 1953) produced son Benjamin.
mz-web.de.376296.17: In Paris, de Havilland married journalist Pierre Paul Galante, with whom she had daughter Gisèle.
mz-web.de.376296.19: Rumors of an affair with former British prime minister Edward Heath were never confirmed.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.1: "Road to Timmendorf": Beach volleyball: Thole/Wickler miss out on final on their comeback
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.2: World Championship runners-up Julius Thole and Clemens Wickler missed out on the final of the "Road to Timmendorf" beach volleyball tournament.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.3: As the top teams met in Düsseldorf, they lost 1-2 (17:21, 21:17, 19:21) in the semi-final to their colleagues from the national team, Nils Ehlers und Lars Flüggen.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.4: Thole/Wickler last played at the World Tour Final in Rome last September.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.5: In the final on the Rhine, their opponents Ehlers/Flüggen were defeated 0-2 (17:21, 17:21) by surprise team Lukas Pfretschner and his interim partner Steven van de Velde.
augsburger-allgemeine.de.107103.6: Alongside the showcase tournament, three places were also up for grabs to contest the German championships in early September on Timmendorf Beach: they were secured by Armin Dollinger/Simon Kulzer, Manuel Harms/Richard Peemüller and Simon Pfretschner/Milan Sievers.
paz-online.de.95211.1: Kalbitz sacking from Alternative from Germany confirmed - FDP speaks of “fig leaf”
paz-online.de.95211.2: The expulsion of Andreas Kalbitz from the AfD is only a “fig leaf” from the FDP’s point of view and doesn’t change anything about the party’s character.
paz-online.de.95211.3: “The AfD is the parliamentary arm of the far-right in Germany.
paz-online.de.95211.4: Andreas Kalbitz is just the tip of the iceberg of the radicals in the AfD,” FDP interior politician Benjamin Strasser told the news agency dpa in Berlin.
paz-online.de.95211.5: The Federal Arbitration Court of the AfD confirmed the expulsion of Kalbitz on Saturday in Stuttgart after several hours of deliberation, the Federal Executive Committee had decided this in May by majority.
paz-online.de.95211.6: Kalbitz is the chair of the AfD faction in the Brandenburg state parliament.
paz-online.de.95211.7: “If the AfD were really serious about consistently removing right wing extremists from their party, officials such as Björn Höcke and his followers would have been removed long ago,” says Strasser.
paz-online.de.95211.8: “However, there is no political will in the AfD, because right-wing extremism is now part of the party.”
paz-online.de.95211.9: CSU secretary general Markus Blume expressed a similar opinion: “The fact that Andreas Kalbitz is excluded now says nothing and changes nothing,” he told the “Welt am Sonntag.”
paz-online.de.95211.10: "Instead, it says a lot about how many frenetic supporters a right-wing extremist still has in the AfD.”
paz-online.de.95211.11: Blume assumes that the AfD will continue to land less than 5 percent in future elections.
paz-online.de.95211.12: “The AfD’s days in the parliaments are numbered.”
paz-online.de.95211.13: Kalbitz was one of the advocates of the official, now disbanded, “wing” around the Thuringia AfD state and faction chair Björn Höcke, which had been classified as a “secured right-wing extremist endeavor” by the Federal Office for the Protection of the Constitution.
paz-online.de.95211.14: In May, the AfD federal board threw Kalbitz out of the party.
paz-online.de.95211.15: The reason they gave was that Kalbitz was a former member or the now forbidden right-wing extremist group “Heimattreue Deutsche Jugend” (HDJ) when he joined the party and did not tell the Republicans.
paz-online.de.95211.16: Kalbitz denies the membership in the HDJ.
paz-online.de.95211.17: The chair of the left-wing faction in the Brandenburg state parliament, Sebastian Walter, emphasizes that the decision of the federal arbitration court doesn’t change anything about the character of the AfD: “This is still a wolf in sheep’s clothing.
paz-online.de.95211.18: The AfD is still a right-wing extremist party, with or without Kalbitz.”
paz-online.de.95211.19: Neither the federal party nor the right wing will be weakened by this decision.
paz-online.de.95211.21: They want to evade further observation by the Federal Office for the Protection of the Constitution and are trying to fly under the radar,” says Walter.
paz-online.de.95211.22: “The AfD won’t be rid of the spirits they have conjured up.
paz-online.de.95211.23: A removal changes nothing,” says the Brandenburg SPD secretary general Erik Stohn about the decision in the Kalbitz case.
paz-online.de.95211.24: “The AfD state association and the faction stood by their right-wing leader until today.”
paz-online.de.95211.25: The legal dispute about Kalbitz’s membership in the AfD will continue.
paz-online.de.95211.26: On Saturday, Kalbitz announced he will dispute the decision of the federal arbitration court in civil court.
paz-online.de.95234.1: North Sea Wind Farms Deliver 21 Percent More Electricity
paz-online.de.95234.2: The wind power stations on the German North Sea have fed 11.51 terawatt hours of electricity into the grid in the first six months of the year.
paz-online.de.95234.3: That’s a good 21 percent more than the same time period in the previous year, said the grid operator Tennet in Bayreuth.
paz-online.de.95234.4: Tennet is responsible for transmitting the North Sea electricity to the mainland and forwarding it on through the German power grid.
paz-online.de.95234.5: The wind power stations on the Baltic Sea, which do not belong to Tennet’s grid area, have fed another 2.22 terawatt hours (TWh) of electricity.
paz-online.de.95234.6: Overall, the wind power from the North Sea and Baltic Sea comes to 13.73 TWh, compared to 11.64 TWh in the first half of 2019.
paz-online.de.95234.7: The wind yield on the sea therefore makes up 19 percent of the total wind power in Germany, which is about four percentage points more than a year ago.
paz-online.de.95234.8: New wind farms provide for additional generation capacities
paz-online.de.95234.9: The increased yield from offshore wind energy is due to, in addition to the wind conditions, increased generation capacities, because new wind parks have been connected to the grid in the past twelve months.
paz-online.de.95234.10: If the 1,270 wind power stations in the North Sea were to all run at full power simultaneously, they could technically generate 6.7 gigawatts of power.
paz-online.de.95234.11: The transmission capacity is sufficient, as according to Tennet, the capacity is 7.1 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.12: By 2030, this should increase in the German North Sea to 17 gigawatts.
paz-online.de.95234.13: “In Germany and in the Netherlands, we are investing 20 billion euros in to expanding the offshore grid connections,” says Tennet CEO Tim Meyerjürgens.
paz-online.de.95234.14: In reality, wind parks cannot exhaust their capacity, even on the sea, but rather achieve about 40 percent.
paz-online.de.95234.15: The current record day this year is January 2, when the North Sea wind parks generated more than six gigawatts of energy.
paz-online.de.95234.16: On average, the North Sea wind turbines produce about 2.5 to 3.0 gigawatts of power, which corresponds to three to four nuclear power plants.
paz-online.de.95234.17: They could therefore supply nearly seven million households with power.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.1: Art “Skirmish” - an exhibition of the Leipzig artist Christian Bold at the Gmünd Art Association gallery.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.2: This was akin to a small anniversary celebration for the 130th
schwaebische-post.de.62187.3: Gmünd Art Association: The exhibition opening “Skirmish” with work from the Leipzig artist Christian Bold broke the mold after the hiatus caused by coronavirus.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.4: Many more art lovers than usual followed the dialog between the artist and the chair of the art association, professor Dr. Klaus Ripper.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.5: The musical equivalent was provided by the band “Defenders of the Universe” on the southern located Kornhausplatz square.
schwaebische-post.de.62187.6: The association “Sandtogether” was involved to the north of the gallery.
dnn-online.de.39567.1: Freital: Windberg Festival cancelled due to coronavirus
dnn-online.de.39567.2: The Windberg Festival will not take place this year.
dnn-online.de.39567.3: The city of Freital has cancelled the three-day festival that was planned for September.
dnn-online.de.39567.4: In other years, over 30,000 people had visited this city festival.
dnn-online.de.39567.5: “We have genuinely not made this decision lightly and, being aware of how financially tough it is for those involved, we were hoping up until the last minute,” explained Mayor Uwe Rumberg (independent).
dnn-online.de.39567.6: “But ultimately, as the organizers, we are responsible for the health of several thousand people”.
dnn-online.de.39567.7: Because if tens of thousands had poured into the festival area and the marquee, we wouldn’t have been able to comply with the virus rules on social distancing, hygiene regulations and contact tracing.
dnn-online.de.39567.8: Or the restrictions would have been so severe that not much of the festival atmosphere would have remained.
dnn-online.de.39567.9: The organization and monitoring costs would also have multiplied and been disproportionate.
dnn-online.de.39567.10: Rumberg was consoled by thoughts of next year.
dnn-online.de.39567.11: The city of Freital will then be celebrating its’ 100th birthday, with festivities including Winterberg Festival from 7th to 9th May 2021 and Saxons’ Day from 10th to 12th September 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.1: Olympic dressage champion Werth unbeatable in Achleiten
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.2: Achleiten - The six-times Olympic champion Isabell Werth was the outstanding rider at the dressage competition in Achleiten, Austria.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.3: The 51 year old from Rheinberg achieved four victories from four starts at the weekend.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.4: After winning one Grand Prix each at Weihegold and Quantaz, she was again unbeatable on Sunday at the Grand Prix Special and in the freestyle.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.5: On Sunday, on the 15 year old mare Weihegold in the Special, Werth gained a clear victory over Austrian Victoria Max-Theurer on Abegglen.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.6: On Saturday at Quantaz, the German also beat her 34 year old pupil Victoria Max-Theurer by a clear margin in the freestyle.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.7: Werth’s winning horse is owned by Max-Theurer.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.8: The world’s most successful dressage rider is aiming to establish the 10 year old stallion in the Grand Prix.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.9: It was Quantaz’s very first freestyle competition.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.10: At the first competition in Achleiten three weeks ago, Werth also won all four major trials.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111367.11: The last of the three international competitions is scheduled to take place there from 14th to 16th August.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.1: More future air traffic controllers in Worms
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.2: The University of Applied Sciences Worms continues to reach for the sky: The DFS (Deutsche Flugsicherung) is to fund a professorship in Air Traffic Management.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.3: A corresponding agreement has now been signed by the University of Applied Sciences Worms and the DFS in Worms.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.4: The agreement is initially for three years and will begin in 2021.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.5: This professorship will enable studies to commence not only in the summer but also in the winter semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.6: This means that twice as many students can be trained as before.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.7: At the same time, capacities at both the university and at the DFS’ air control management academy will be utilized equally.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.8: The DFS will advise the university on setting up the professorship and filling the position.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.10: The first students have been working on the Air Traffic Management course as part of their air traffic control training at Worms University since the 2019 summer semester.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.11: Nine students have started this year already.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.12: To date the DFS has had very positive experiences, as the students have performed excellently.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.13: The combination of course work and air traffic control training is very much helping to make the profession of air traffic controller more attractive.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.14: “Funding doesn’t come easily to us at the current time.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.15: But we believe that air transport will recover and grow again in the long term.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.16: We need highly qualified personnel if we are to be able to meet our statutory remit going forward,” said Professor Klaus-Dieter Scheurle, the DFS Chairman as the agreement was signed.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.17: “For the DFS, the endowed chair is an investment for the future which, over the long term, will give air traffic controllers a broad, interdisciplinary knowledge base.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.18: So we shall be continuing our excellent collaboration with the university and, at the same time, underpinning our appeal as an employer”.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.19: This was also underlined by Professor Dr. Jens Hermsdorf, President of the University of Applied Sciences Worms, “The endowed professorship forms an important bridge between academia and business.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.20: With it, we wish to link in to the existing collaboration with the DFS as our practical partner for the dual bachelor degree program in Air Traffic Management.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.21: For Worms University, the faith shown by the DFS provides both motivation and an obligation to further develop its teaching and research skills in the future areas of air transport.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.22: With this first endowed chair for a dual degree program, the university will be able to offer the air traffic controllers of tomorrow some excellent highlights and innovations.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.23: Dr. Denis Alt, State Secretary at the Ministry for Science, Education and Culture, said, “With its focus on the air transport sector, Worms University has a unique selling point in Rhineland-Palatinate.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111392.24: The signing of the collaboration agreement today will strengthen the university’s profile”.
main-netz.de.61826.1: Air ambulance lands on the A 45
main-netz.de.61826.2: The A 45 motorway in the direction of Aschaffenburg was completely closed for around 30 minutes on Saturday lunchtime as an air ambulance was deployed following a traffic accident.
main-netz.de.61826.3: At around 12.40 pm a 76 year old driving a Ford went straight into the curve at the Alzenau-Mitte exit and hit the crash barrier.
main-netz.de.61826.4: The collision triggered the front airbags, causing the drive to suffer slight injuries to his face, and meaning he had to be taken to hospital for treatment.
main-netz.de.61826.5: The paramedic treated the 72 year old passenger’s injuries and the patient was then flown to hospital in the air ambulance.
main-netz.de.61826.6: The police currently believe that there is no danger to life.
main-netz.de.61826.7: With damages valued at around 2000 euros, the vehicle had to be towed away.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.1: Heil intends looking at other sectors after the meat industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.2: The coronavirus crisis has again exposed conditions in parts of the meat industry.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.4: But are they legal - and will they stick?
mittelbayerische.de.307327.5: Following on from the tough rules that are now planned against failings in the meat industry, the Federal Minister of Employment, Hubertus Heil (SPD), is also intending to look at other sectors.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.6: “We shall study them sector by sector and then, if required, take suitable measures for the sector concerned,” Heil told the Deutsche Presse agency in Berlin.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.7: German employers are already warning against generally restricting work contracts.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.8: After the massive coronavirus outbreak at meat giant Tönnies in North Rhine-Westphalia, the federal cabinet is intending to enact one of Heil’s laws this Wednesday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.9: Large slaughterhouses will no longer be permitted to employ third party staff for slaughtering, cutting or meat processing.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.10: And the use of work contracts and temporary staff is also set to be banned.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.11: Employers’ President Ingo Kramer told the dpa, “Stay away from any general restriction on work contracts and contract staffing if you don’t want to completely choke the economy”.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.12: For example, for broad sections of the skilled crafts sector, the construction industry and plant engineering, work contracts are the very basis of their added value for the customer.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.13: “Individual failings cannot ruin a key instrument like this.”
mittelbayerische.de.307327.14: Heil promised, “My aim isn’t to ban work contracts everywhere in German business.”
mittelbayerische.de.307327.16: “When an industrial company hires a skilled person to install a safety system, that’s a completely normal work contract”.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.17: The German meat industry believes that banning work contracts and temporary employment in their sector alone is unconstitutional.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.18: There was no explanation as to why, in the future, the employment law applied to cutting up and packaging cheese should be different to that applied to sausage, said a statement on the planned legislation, as the "Neue Osnabrücker Zeitung" reported (Saturday).
mittelbayerische.de.307327.19: Were there to be a ban, the consumer price would rise by 10 to 20 percent per kilo.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.20: Many Eastern European workers in contractor companies in the sector were sometimes working 16 hours per day, according to the findings of an investigation by NRW’s Employment Protection Office.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.22: Wages were held back for protective equipment or rent.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.23: It was also found that workers’ accommodation situations were often poor.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.24: Heil said that a relatively tough law for the meat industry had been passed in 2017.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.25: But they had been circumvented by “cunning systems”.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.27: The politician said, “The employment protection law that we in the cabinet want to pass in late July also contains measures that affect not only the meat sector - for example, higher check rates for employment protection and clear criteria for shared accommodation”.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.28: The draft available to the dpa contains amendments to the law on safeguarding employee rights in the meat industry and the employment protection law.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.29: Brandenburg’s Consumer Protection Minister Ursula Nonnemacher (Greens) believes tighter controls are necessary.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.30: “I’d like to be able to carry out even more inspections in many supervisory areas: food inspections, animal protection, everything possible, for example animal transport too,” Nonnemacher said in the RBB program "Brandenburg aktuell" on Sunday.
mittelbayerische.de.307327.31: But more staff would also be required for any increase in inspections.
tt.com.148707.1: Three dead in ultralight aircraft crash in Germany
tt.com.148707.2: According to police, three people have died after an ultralight aircraft crashed into an apartment building in Wesel in the German state of North Rhine-Westphalia.
tt.com.148707.4: Two other people were rescued from the accident with injuries, said a spokesman from the district control center.
tt.com.148707.5: A parachute was found at the site of the accident, say police.
tt.com.148707.6: The “Rheinische Post” reports that eyewitnesses say the aircraft collided with a hot air balloon before crashing.
tt.com.148707.7: The house was a detached or semi-detached home.
tt.com.148707.8: More details are not known at this time.
rundschau-online.de.151934.1: Frankfurt Opernplatz central square cleared peacefully
rundschau-online.de.151934.2: One week after the riots in Frankfurt, the Opernplatz square was cleared peacefully Saturday night.
rundschau-online.de.151934.3: Several dozen people were still in the square, but they left before the curfew began at 1 am.
rundschau-online.de.151934.4: The police had deployed numerous officers since the early evening, meaning a larger police presence could be seen in the city.
rundschau-online.de.151934.5: This is the first weekend with a ban on entering the Opernplatz square starting at midnight, where there were riots one week ago.
rundschau-online.de.151934.6: Revelers threw bottles at the police from the crowd.
rundschau-online.de.151934.7: At least five officers were injured and several police vehicles were damaged, according to the police.
hna.de.247362.1: Car flips over: Young woman seriously injured in accident on Highway 83 near Hofgeismar
hna.de.247362.2: A 21-year-old woman suffered serious injuries at around 1:25 p.m. on Sunday in an accident between Schöneberg and Hümme.
hna.de.247362.3: She was taken to Kassel Hospital.
hna.de.247362.4: The fire service used infrared cameras to search for any possible passengers.
hna.de.247362.5: According to the police, the woman was driving towards her home town of Humme on Highway 83 when, for some unexplained reason, her car left the road and flipped over several times.
hna.de.247362.6: The fire service had to cut the car roof away to save the casualty.
hna.de.247362.7: Since it was unclear whether anyone else was in the vehicle, an infrared camera was deployed from the turntable ladder to search the adjacent cornfield.
hna.de.247362.8: The drone section from Warburg, who also work with infrared cameras, was also called up for the search.
hna.de.247362.9: However, the rescue workers failed to find anyone amongst the tall corn plants.
hna.de.247362.10: The seriously injured woman was taken by ambulance to Kassel Hospital for further treatment.
hna.de.247362.11: Almost 50 rescue workers from the Hofgeismar, Hümme and Schöneberg fire services attended the location.
hna.de.247362.12: The accident caused the highway to close for two hours.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.2: Turin - After a redeeming goal from Cristiano Ronaldo, Juventus of Turin, who hold the record for the number of Italian league championships won, have secured the title for the ninth time in a row.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.3: The team, including five players dubbed World Footballer Of The Year wrapped up their 36th Scudetto in the club’s history on Sunday evening by winning 2:0 (1:0) in their home game against Sampdoria of Genoa.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.4: Ronaldo scored to make it 1:0 before half-time.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.5: With two more matchdays to go before the Serie A season ends, Turin have 83 points and can no longer be knocked off top spot, but are playing without former German international Sami Khedira who has been injured for some time.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.6: Inter Milan, who are currently second in the table, are seven points behind.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.7: In the first half, despite their apparent superiority, Juventus caused little threat, but then Ronaldo scored from a set-piece free kick in the last action before the break.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.8: With a low shot, the 35 year old converted a Miralem Pjanic pass from the edge of the area (45+7).
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.9: With the visitors now attacking more, Ronaldo was also involved in making it 2:0, after Federico Bernardeschi (67) helped with his shot.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.10: That ensured the lacklustre but crucial victory.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.11: When he hit the bar from a penalty in the 89th minute, only Ronaldo himself, with one eye on the battle to be top scorer, would have really been annoyed.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.12: “It’s tough to stay on the ball, both mentally and physically, for 90 minutes.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.13: The games are strange and the momentum changes very easily,” explained coach Maurizio Sarri after the 1:2 against Udinese on Thursday.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.14: In particular, his players were mentally exhausted, said the Juve coach.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.15: The defeat meant that the Turin outfit was unable to seal the title in a perfect manner.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.16: Recently Juve have had their rivals’ weaknesses to thank for the gap at the top of the table, which was comfortable in the end.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.17: Because Sarri’s team had only won five out of the eleven matches prior to Sunday’s game.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.18: And whether Ronaldo will end up top scorer is questionable.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.19: For while the Portuguese superstar has scored 31 goals so far, after his hat trick in the 5:1 (1:1) against fourth-placed Lazio of Rome, former Dortmund star Ciro Immobile has 34 goals to his name - as many as Robert Lewandowski contributed in FC Bayern’s title win.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.20: Gonzalo Higuaín, now with Juve, holds the Italian record.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.21: The Argentinian scored 36 goals for SSC Napoli in the 2015/2016 season.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.22: The next opportunity for the “Old Lady” of Italian football to win a trophy will come in August.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.23: Juventus are in the quarter final of the Champions League, but they have to make good a 0:1 deficit from the first leg against Olympique Lyonnais on 7th August if they are to reach the final tournament in Lisbon.
lampertheimer-zeitung.de.111397.24: Real Madrid or Manchester City would await them as their opponent in the next knockout round.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.1: Baden-Württemberg: Over 250 illegal car races recorded
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.2: Stuttgart - In spite of all threatened penalties and court decisions, drivers continue to put the pedal to the metal in numerous illegal races on roads in Baden-Württemberg: Over the last year and the first four months of this year, the police in the southwest have already registered more than 250 illegal races.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.3: There are no comparison values for the years prior, but the racers are creating increasingly more work for legal authorities: In 2018, a total of 155 preliminary proceedings were conducted for illegal racing at the public attorney’s offices between Constance and Mannheim - one year later, it was already 252 and this year it has already reached 151 at the start of June.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.4: According to the response from the Ministry of the Interior to a request from the state parliament SPD, the races are not really organized events.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.5: In most cases, the drivers have met up spontaneously or they had fled from the police - this is also registered as illegal racing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.6: Drivers were primarily German males aged 18 - 60.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.8: The racers are only arrested in relatively few cases and also asked to pay: According to the Ministry of the Interior, a total of 113 fines have been charged since 2018 and 15 prison sentences issued.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.9: But there are no indications that the number of illegal car racers is actually increasing.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.10: Rather, other drivers are reacting more sensibly than before due to the countless tragic accidents and lawsuits over the past years and are reporting incidents more often, said a ministry spokesperson.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.11: Highway 8 is particularly popular among racers. Drivers are always stopping traffic there to create space and use the open section for a race.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.12: Last August, a dozen drivers were caught near Kirchheim unter Teck, an three months before that, there were also 18 drivers on the A8 at Merklingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.13: A81 is the most popular “race track”
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.14: The police actually register more races on the A81 than any other federal highway.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.15: A speed limit there is being used to thwart the racers on a particularly affected section between Engen and Geisingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.16: The usually high-priced and tricked out sports and luxury cars often have Swiss license plates, because the drivers often come to Germany due to the high penalties for driving too fast and racing in the neighboring country.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.17: For the SPD, the speed limit shouldn’t be restricted to a few routes: “A general speed limit of 130 km/h would get rid of this problem on highways,” says Martin Rivoir, the traffic expert from the SPD state parliament faction.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.18: “The inhibition threshold for racers would be much higher if they couldn’t still legally drive at 200 km/h here and there.”
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.19: Rivoir doesn’t think much about education or image campaigns: “You can’t use reason to reach anyone who defies all the rules like this and not only puts their own life, but the lives of others at risk.”
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.20: ADAC calls for stronger measures by the police
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.21: But for the ADAC, this is not enough: “We assume that racers are not scared by the speed limits,” says Holger Bach, department head for Traffic and Environment at ADAC Württemberg.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.22: He is calling for additional and harsher controls on the affected sections.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.23: The high-speed trials of strength sometimes have painful and serious consequences: Between January 2019 and April 2020, three people have died nationwide in the races, two of them bystanders in a crash at night in Stuttgart’s inner city and one in Gerlingen.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.24: Two men allegedly had a car race there in November.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.25: One of the vehicles flew off the road, crashed into a garden fence and landed on its side, the 18-year old passenger died.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.26: 21 other people have been injured in the races in the past two years.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836037.27: More stringent penalties, however, are not necessary according to the Interior Minister Thomas Strobl: The Ministry of the Interior’s paper states that “we see no need for legislative action to sanction illegal car racing more strictly.”
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.1: Blue light of July 23: Thirsty burglar steals drinks from snack stand
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.2: Rohrdorf: On Thursday, a man broke into a snack stand in Rohrdorf (district of Calw) and stole drinks and cash.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.3: One witness heard noises on Talstraße around 3:40 am and ran in the direction of the snack stand.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.4: He noticed a man there who was helping himself to the refrigerator filled with drinks and then left the snack stand through an entry door he had smashed in.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.5: The perpetrator fled towards the meadows behind the snack stand.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.6: The burglar also helped himself to the cash register and stole cash in the lower three figure range, according to the police.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.7: The suspect is described as follows: He is about 1.75 to 1.80 meters tall and has a strong build.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.8: During the crime, he wore a black hoodie, black pants and light colored shoes.
schwarzwaelder-bote.de.10836351.9: Please contact the police if you have additional information.
pnp.de.390142.1: Ackermann springs to victory in the last stage of the Sibiu Cycling Tour
pnp.de.390142.2: Cycling professional Pascal Ackermann battled his way to his second day of victory on the final stage of the 10th Sibiu Cycling Tour.
pnp.de.390142.3: The 26-year old Palatinate native from the Bora-Hansgrohe team persevered in the 109 km section starting and ending in Hermannstadt in a bunch sprint after he had already won a stage on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.4: These were the third and fourth victories of the season for Ackermann.
pnp.de.390142.5: His Austrian teammate Gregor Mühlberger won the overall standings.
pnp.de.390142.6: The 26-year old decisively won the mountain times in the morning, taking the top in the list of rankings.
pnp.de.390142.7: Only 104 riders took to the starting line in the evening for the final stage.
pnp.de.390142.8: No fewer than 18 starters fell victim to the time limit in the mountain times.
pnp.de.390142.9: “I am really happy to begin the season restart with a victory,” Ackermann stated after his success on Saturday.
pnp.de.390142.10: “The sprint was really hectic,” said the 26-year-old.
pnp.de.390142.11: 300 meters before the finish he just picked up his pace, “and it worked out perfectly.”
pnp.de.390142.12: According to the rules of the UCI world association, all riders and their companions underwent coronavirus tests six days before the race.
pnp.de.390142.13: During the entire tour, riders and supporters were separated from the organizational team and the media in isolated hygiene bubbles.
pnp.de.390142.14: Spectators were not permitted at the start or finish.
bild.254818.2: Düsseldorf - Tragic accident in Garath on Sunday afternoon
bild.254818.3: In an apartment building, a child (4) suddenly lay lifeless in the water while having a bath.
bild.254818.4: According to the fire service, the emergency call came in shortly before 1 p.m.
bild.254818.5: “A control center agent immediately gave CPR instructions,” a fire service spokesman told BILD.
bild.254818.6: When they arrived shortly afterwards, the paramedics took over the resuscitation efforts.
bild.254818.7: Clinging to life and still receiving CPR, the child was taken to the university hospital.
bild.254818.8: It is unclear why he died.
bild.254818.9: The police have opened a routine investigation into the accident.
bild.254818.10: The fire service spokesman said, “We’re assuming that this was a tragic accident in the apartment.”
infranken.de.309656.1: Nuremberg: Unauthorized tuning rally - Police intervene, 700 vehicles and around 1100 people
infranken.de.309656.2: Hundreds of cars and, at times, over 1000 people took part in a “tuning rally” on Saturday night in a furniture store car park.
infranken.de.309656.3: The police carried out their threat to clamp down more severely on this type of event.
infranken.de.309656.4: A large tuning rally was held on Saturday evening (25th July 2020) in south Nuremberg.
infranken.de.309656.6: According to the Central Franconia Police, at around 10:30 p.m. the Nuremberg Traffic Police noticed an increase in traffic in the area of a large car park in Ingolstädter Strasse.
infranken.de.309656.7: The police then carried out a large number of vehicle checks.
infranken.de.309656.8: Only recently the police announced that they would take a firmer approach against so-called auto posers.
infranken.de.309656.9: Illegal tuning rally in Nuremberg: Only a few from the “scene”
infranken.de.309656.10: At its peak, the officers counted a good 700 vehicles and around 1100 people.
infranken.de.309656.11: However, only a small number of those present were categorized as “auto posers” or part of the tuning scene.
infranken.de.309656.12: It seems that most people came to the scene after the police appeal.
infranken.de.309656.13: Judging from the vehicles and individuals present at the location, it is believed that most of them were curious bystanders.
infranken.de.309656.14: Moreover, the majority of those present were complying with infection regulations, particularly observing minimum distances and wearing face coverings.
