infranken.de.309656.15: The checks carried out at the location finished at around 1 a.m.
infranken.de.309656.16: In all, the officers identified 10 vehicles with modifications such that permission to operate them was withdrawn.
infranken.de.309656.17: Four of these vehicles had to be impounded.
infranken.de.309656.19: No illegal car races took place.
infranken.de.309656.20: “The Central Franconia Police Headquarters will continue to bear the incident in mind and will continue to carry out checks, including in connection with the volume of curious bystanders,” it was stated.
infranken.de.309656.21: The News5 agency spoke to Jürgen Schrödinger from the towing company that was involved, “They all have nice wheel rims, and we had to avoid scratching them,” said Schrödinger.
infranken.de.309656.22: Special bands were used for that purpose.
infranken.de.309656.23: And because the cars are wider, the company had to take care that no damage was done.
infranken.de.309656.24: “After all, the youngsters need to get their cars back unharmed”.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.1: Figures from the employment agency: 900 suspicious cases of abuse of short-time working hours
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.2: Berlin - The Federal Employment Agency (BA) says it is investigating around 900 suspicious cases of abuse of short-time working benefits.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.3: “With more than 880,000 companies reporting reduced working hours, this is an extremely low number,” board member Daniel Terzenbach, who is responsible for the operational business, told the “Frankfurter Allgemeinen Zeitung.”
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.4: When a lot of companies suddenly applied for reduced working hours when the coronavirus crisis began, the BA had to respond quickly.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.5: The review normally takes up to three weeks.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.6: “We did not have that much time during this intense phase.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.7: So we will therefore look at the final settlements all the more closely.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.8: There will surely be more to come.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.9: We are also not naive and have a lot of patience.”
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.10: Employees or trade unions concerned often reported the abuse.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.11: In addition, the BA uses analysis software to identify patterns of abuse.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.12: According to Terzenbach, the BA is preparing for a possible wave of bankruptcy in the fall.
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.13: “Will there be significantly more bankruptcies than in the previous year?
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.14: Estimates differ, but we are preparing for the worst case scenario and are already training our employees at employment agencies how to process applications for insolvency payments.”
nordbayerischer-kurier.de.54339.15: The numbers are still unremarkable,” said Terzenbach.
pnn.de.185998.1: World Heritage in Potsdam: Party broken up in New Garden
pnn.de.185998.2: Potsdam - On Friday evening, about 40 adolescents were had a party in New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.3: The gathering was broken up at 8:48 p.m. by the motorized patrol of the Prussian Palaces and Gardens Foundation (SPSG), the foundation said in response to PNN’s request.
pnn.de.185998.4: The adolescents then left the park.
pnn.de.185998.5: Then, on Saturday evening, a group of adolescents played rugby in New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.6: The lawn was cleared by the motorized patrol, said SPSG spokesperson Frank Kallensee on Sunday.
pnn.de.185998.7: There are frequently illegal parties in the parks
pnn.de.185998.8: There are frequently gatherings in the foundation’s parks where the social distancing and hygiene rules of the Covid-19 contact ordinance cannot be maintained.
pnn.de.185998.9: At the end of June, there was a party with about 300 people in Park Babelsberg, one week later about 150 people partied in New Garden.
pnn.de.185998.10: Even without the coronavirus ordinance, the parks are closed when it gets dark.
pnn.de.185998.11: Camping on the lawns is prohibited according to the park ordinances, there are only a few exceptions.
pnn.de.185998.12: The foundation has long complained that visitors always leave behind trash and would destroy protected biotopes.
pnn.de.185998.13: In Berlin, illegal park parties have reached a new dimension.
pnn.de.185998.14: In the Hasenheide park in the district of Neukölln, 5,000 people had an illegal techno party Saturday night.
pnn.de.185998.15: The police broke up the party.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.1: Austria: Mass testing after coronavirus outbreak in tourist resort
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.2: Authorities have responded to a coronavirus outbreak with hundreds of tests in the popular Upper Austrian tourist resort of St. Wolfgang.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.3: The number of confirmed cases rose to 48, according to regional authorities in Linz.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.4: By the evening, over 100 results were still outstanding.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.5: They report that many of those infected are young interns in tourist businesses, though at least one holidaymaker had also tested positive.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.6: Residents, guests and tourism personnel were asked to remain in their accommodation on Saturday evening.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.8: “There have been cancellations here and there,” the Head of the Wolfgangsee Tourism Association, Hans Wieser, told the dpa.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.9: A few guests had also departed early.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.10: St. Wolfgang is the biggest tourist resort in Upper Austria, with over 400,000 overnight stays last year.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.11: In a normal season, around one third of visitors are German.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.12: The first infections were announced on Friday.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.13: On Saturday the head of the district authority, Alois Lanz, defended the behavior of the interns, who had been partying in various bars and could have become infected there.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.14: “We all enjoyed doing that when we were young,” he told the Ö1 radio station.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.15: However, two bars were closed on Friday to prevent further infections.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.16: The Tourism Association initiated an information campaign to raise young employees’ awareness of the dangers of Covid-19.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.17: Then, from Saturday, hundreds of staff, holidaymakers and locals were tested.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.18: All visitors who had been to St. Wolfgang since 15th July were also contacted.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.19: The outbreak is a reminder of the Austrian ski and party resort Ischgl in Tirol, which was a center for the spread of the virus throughout Europe in the initial phase of the pandemic.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.20: Over 1500 people, in all, are currently infected with the virus in Austria.
braunschweiger-zeitung.de.164637.21: Vienna and Upper Austria have particularly high levels of new infections.
wn.de.700458.1: Premier League: Man United and Chelsea qualify for Champions League
wn.de.700458.2: London (dpa)- The English soccer record champion Manchester United returns to the Champions League after a year being absent.
wn.de.700458.3: The Red Devils secured the third ranking on the last day of play in the Premier League with a 2:0 (0:0) win against direct competitors Leicester City.
wn.de.700458.4: The Foxes now have to content themselves with the Europa League, because FC Chelsea passed them and qualified in fourth place for the Champions League.
wn.de.700458.5: Aston Villa can celebrate in the fight against relegation.
wn.de.700458.6: Manchester United took the lead thanks to a penalty kick by Bruno Fernandes (71st minute).
wn.de.700458.7: After a red card for Leicester City during injury time, Jesse Lingard (90th + 8) scored the final goal.
wn.de.700458.8: Chelsea, opponent to FC Bayern in the Champions League quarter finals, won in parallel thanks to Mason Mount (45th minute + 1) and Olivier Giroud (45th minute + 4) with 2:0 (2:0) against the Wolverhampton Wanderers.
wn.de.700458.9: “This means a lot to me,” said trainer Frank Lampard, who is also in the final of the FA Cup against Arsenal in his first season as the Chelsea coach.
wn.de.700458.10: Tottenham Hotspurs also benefitted from Chelsea’s victory against Wolverhampton, moving past Wolves with a meager 1:1 (1:0) victory at Crystal Palace and starting in sixth place in the Europa League.
wn.de.700458.11: Aston Villa won the standing battle with FC Watford and AFC Bournemouth, but were nervous about staying in the league when playing West Ham United.
wn.de.700458.12: The late lead by Jack Grealish (84th minute) was immediately equalized by Andrej Jarmolenko (85th minute).
wn.de.700458.13: The 1:1 (0:0) sufficed though, because Watford lost at Arsenal 2:3 (1:3).
wn.de.700458.14: The club, which sacked three coaches this season, is being relegated after five years in the top league.
wn.de.700458.15: Just like Bournemouth, which couldn’t save itself with a 3:1 (2:1) win at FC Everton.
wn.de.700458.16: They were missing a point in the end.
wn.de.700458.17: FC Liverpool, which has already been crowned the English champion since the end of June, set a club record with a 3:1 (1:1) win at Newcastle United.
wn.de.700458.18: 99 points is the most that the Reds have ever achieved in a single soccer season.
wn.de.700458.19: Coach Jürgen Klopp and his team just narrowly missed the point record in English soccer.
wn.de.700458.20: The record is held by Manchester City with 100 points in the 2017/2018 season.
wn.de.700458.21: After the Newcastle lead in the first minute, Virgil van Dijk (38th), Divock Origi (59th) and Sadio Mané (89th minute) turned the tide for Liverpool on Sunday.
wn.de.700458.22: “It was an exceptional season for this wonderful club,” said goal scorer van Dijk after the game, “this should spur us on to defend the title.
wn.de.700458.24: The Premier League bosses may also be happy in the end.
wn.de.700458.25: Due to the coronavirus crisis, soccer in England was halted from March 13 to June 17.
wn.de.700458.26: In between, there was even talk of ending the season early or playing the rest of the games on neutral territory.
wn.de.700458.27: Ultimately, however, the season was played out to the end without incident - although, like in Germany, without spectators in the stadiums.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.1: Arrests and violence at demonstrations against Netanyahu
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.2: Protests in Israel against the government head Netanyahu are becoming more intense.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.4: The Israeli police took violent action against participants of a demonstration against the right-wing conservative head of government Benjamin Netanyahu Saturday night in Jerusalem.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.5: Two people were arrested for their participation in the unrest, according to police spokesman Micky Rosenfeld.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.6: The police used water cannons, among other things, to break up the demonstration.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.7: According to media reports, around 6,000 people in total gathered near Netanyahu’s official residence on Saturday night.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.8: They were protesting against unemployment, corruption and Netanyahu’s handling of the coronavirus crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.9: The protestors beat drums, blew horns and called for Netanyahu to resign.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.10: Participants of a counter-demonstration who supported Netanyahu were also arrested, reports the news site “ynet.”
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.11: People also demonstrated in many other places in Israel, including in front of the private villa of the head of government in the coastal city of Caesarea and in a park in Tel Aviv.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.12: According to police information, a man was arrested near Tel Aviv, because he was suspected of spraying pepper spray on demonstrators on the edge of the street out of a driving car.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.13: Another man was arrested after a knife attack on a demonstrator in the south of the country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.14: The demonstrator suffered a minor neck injury.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.15: There have been multiple demonstrations against Netanyahu in Jerusalem and Tel Aviv recently.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.16: The demonstrations are accompanying the corruption trial against the head of the government.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.17: Netanyahu has also been recently criticized for his handling of the coronavirus crisis.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.18: Among other complaints, he has been criticized of loosening restrictions too soon and not being well-prepared for a second wave of the coronavirus.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.19: The coronavirus crisis has severely impaired the country’s economy.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.20: The unemployment rate was most recently at more than 20 percent.
rhein-zeitung.de.234632.21: The number of new infections of coronavirus in Israel has recently risen to new records.
bild.254850.1: Accident near Ahlen (North Rhine Westphalia) - Van crashes into car - nine injured - Ruhr - Bild.de
bild.254850.2: Ahlen - A rear-end collision left nine people with minor injuries on Saturday afternoon on the B58 near Ahlen.
bild.254850.3: A woman was driving towards Beckum with her two children (3 and 5).
bild.254850.4: According to police, “She probably braked suddenly because she wanted to turn off”.
bild.254850.5: The driver of a Mercedes van who was behind her spotted it too late.
bild.254850.6: He smashed into the rear of the car.
bild.254850.7: The three occupants of the car and the six in the van received minor injuries in the accident.
bild.254850.8: Several ambulances took them to a nearby hospital.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.1: North Korea closes off border city after suspected coronavirus case
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.2: North Korea views its own measures to protect against the coronavirus as a “gleaming success.”
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.3: Now the country is reporting a suspected case for the first time.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.4: Due to a first official suspected case of coronavirus in the country, North Korea has completely shut down a major city out of fear of a disaster.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.5: Despite the strictest epidemiological defensive measures in the past six months, “the virulent virus was still able to make its way into the country,” reports the state media.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.6: A state of emergency has been called for the region around the border city of Kaesong.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.7: The communistic government rang the highest alarm level.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.8: If the suspected case is confirmed, it would be the first official case of infection with Sars-CoV-2 in the isolated country.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.9: According to its own statements, North Korea has so far not registered any infections, and has described its defensive measures as a “gleaming success.”
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.10: The statements have been doubted abroad.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.11: According to the reports, symptoms of the illness were found in a “runner” who illegally crossed the military demarcation line between South and North Korea on July 19.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.12: The person defected to South Korea three years ago and has now returned over the border.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.13: South Korea initially has given no confirmation of the border crossing within the military buffer zone that is four kilometers wide and is still mostly covered with land mines.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.14: According to reports from the national news agency Yonhap, South Korea’s military considers the possibility of an illegal border crossing into North Korea as high.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.15: There are ongoing investigations of several people.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.16: According to its own statements, North Korea called an urgent meeting of the workers’ party politburo, chaired by leader Kim Jong Un, regarding the suspected case on Saturday.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.17: The “dangerous situation in Kaesong could trigger a deadly and destructive disaster.”
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.18: Kim already arranged “to completely block off Kaesong and isolate every district and the region from each other as a preventative measure,” it continues.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.19: The affected person, as well as all people in Kaesong who may have had contact with this person, have been placed under quarantine.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.20: According to this, the party’s central military commission is set to investigate the “runner case” and the behavior of the responsible military unit, as well as possibly imposing strict punishments.
rhein-zeitung.de.234631.21: According to estimates, approximately 300,000 people live in Kaesong.
pz-news.de.72354.1: Tension before council meeting: East of the city and noise protection are up for discussion before the big summer break
pz-news.de.72354.2: “In addition to environmental topics, the committee members will also vote on the development plan for the major project of the inner city east development,” states the middle section of the city’s press release for the next municipal council meeting on Tuesday, July 28, at 4:30 p.m. in the large hall of the Congress Centrum Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.3: However, the betterment of the eastern side of the city remains a bitter discussion to the very end.
pz-news.de.72354.4: The majority being in favor is tight, most recently even being rejected in individual committees, depending on attendance.
pz-news.de.72354.5: An appeal from the economy (construction, real estate, trade and IT) not to let the project, which was developed from the citizens and then by the administration of the municipal council, fail after nearly ten years of preparation was criticized by project critic Reinhard Klein as “extra-parliamentary opposition,” “naive,” “speculation,” “denigration” and “deliberate false statements.”
pz-news.de.72354.6: “Everyone thinks they know better,” says Klein, who has been part of the municipal council for a year as the only representative from the citizens’ party ticket of Pforzheim.
pz-news.de.72354.7: In fact, he said this was his position after reading the contracts: “I know what I am talking about.”
pz-news.de.72354.8: Abandoning the project would be cheaper for the city - contrary to the city administration’s statements, the technical city hall could be renovated for EUR 8.5 million with grants, the existence of which Klein is convinced of.
pz-news.de.72354.9: The city will develop very differently than predicted in the town hall and by the advocates from the local economy.
pz-news.de.72354.10: Designing the city on our own and not by an investor: That’s his plan B. One day later, Klein presented an alternative concept to the FDP/FW/UB/LED faction, who also rejected the project.
pz-news.de.72354.11: It essentially also provides for the renovation of the technical city hall, keeping the Schloßberg open, renting out the former Thales for administrative space, and a smaller inner city redesign in an ideal case with local providers.
pz-news.de.72354.12: Environmental topics play a key role
pz-news.de.72354.13: In addition, environmental issues play a key role here.
pz-news.de.72354.14: That is why the municipal council will also vote on the noise abatement plan.
pz-news.de.72354.15: This includes various measures to protect the Profzheim population against harmful noise caused by road traffic, including many speed reductions.
pz-news.de.72354.16: In a press release, local Verkehrsclub Deutschland [local chapter of German traffic club] welcomes the widespread introduction of a 30 km/h speed limit. City policy makers are partly to blame that this must be introduced, because they neglected the urban bus traffic with thinned out routes, and were not committed to bicycle traffic so that it lead to a massive increase in car traffic and therefore the noise level, says the Verkehrsclub Deutschland.
pz-news.de.72354.17: The municipal council will also vote on the city’s participation in the energy and climate protection agency of Pforzheim/Enzkreis.
pz-news.de.72354.18: In addition, entry into the climate protection pact of the state of Baden-Württemberg, redefining parental contributions to city daycare centers, and the application to be included in the federal government’s Smart City funding are all on the agenda.
pz-news.de.72354.19: Citizens are welcome, but must take a coronavirus protective measures.
schwaebische.de.113555.1: Tim Zimmermann is starting the new season with a big delay
schwaebische.de.113555.2: With almost a half of a year delay, Tim Zimmermann is starting his debut season in ADAC GT Masters on July 31.
schwaebische.de.113555.3: Before the supercar league can resume regular operations, the first test runs must be performed.
schwaebische.de.113555.4: For Zimmermann, this was primarily about getting to know his Lamborghini Huracan GT3 better.
schwaebische.de.113555.5: The coronavirus has long prevented Tim Zimmermann from being able to take his first drive in the new Lamborghini Huracan from Grasser Racing.
schwaebische.de.113555.6: This has now been possible under special hygiene conditions.
schwaebische.de.113555.7: The 23-year-old Langenargen native drove his first laps on the Lausitzring and was able to get comfortable on his debut in the GT3 car.
schwaebische.de.113555.8: “There are a few things that are different than with the Porsche from last season,” says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.9: “You can corner differently with the ABS, for example.
schwaebische.de.113555.10: But it was really a ton of fun.”
schwaebische.de.113555.11: Zimmermann also had fun with Steijn Schothorst with whom he will share his orange sportscar in the GT Masters.
schwaebische.de.113555.12: The Dutchman is already experienced in the GT sport, despite only being 25 years old, and was able to help his new team colleague with many things.
schwaebische.de.113555.13: “I’m not a beginner at motor sports, but every new series also brings new challenges with it,” says Zimmermann.
schwaebische.de.113555.14: “Steijn and I get along wonderfully and we’ve made tremendous progress on the Lausitzring from session to session.”
schwaebische.de.113555.15: The GT Masters will also have its first race here, at the Lausitzring.
schwaebische.de.113555.16: 33 supercars will race through the Lausitz on July 31.
schwaebische.de.113555.17: Zimmermann, who is one of 15 series newbies, knows the track though.
schwaebische.de.113555.18: In 2015, he was a guest at the Motodrom.
schwaebische.de.113555.19: “It worked quickly and I had to get used the track a little,” says Zimmermann, who raced for the Friedrichshafen racing team Graf Zeppelin.
schwaebische.de.113555.20: “The Lausitzring has a lot of fast passages that you have to hit perfectly to be fast.”
schwaebische.de.113555.21: We’ll find out in two weeks how fast Zimmermann actually is.
schwaebische.de.113555.22: “The teams of course push their luck a bit on the tests,” he says.
schwaebische.de.113555.23: “Ultimately, though, we are very satisfied and are looking forward to the first weekend on the Lausitzring.”
schwaebische.de.113555.24: The race in Brandenburg will be the kick-off to a tightly-packed calendar.
schwaebische.de.113555.25: There are seven races on the docket by early November.
schwaebische.de.113555.26: Currently no spectators are allowed - but there will be one prominent guest.
schwaebische.de.113555.27: In mid-August on the Nürburgring, ex-Formula 1 pilot Niko Hülkenberg will take the GT wheel.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.1: British traffic minister caught with his pants down by quarantine decision
wienerzeitung.at.136148.2: The decision of the British government to place Spanish vacationers under quarantine for two weeks after their return has caught the traffic minister of the country with his pants down according to press reports.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.3: According to the reports, Grant Schapps is currently on vacation in Spain, while his colleagues at home decided the measure on Saturday.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.4: Due to the coronavirus numbers in Spain rising again, the cabinet in London struck the country from the list of countries you can return from without going into quarantine.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.5: The new regulation goes into effect today, which means Schapps needs to go into quarantine after his return.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.6: In Austria, the government has also imposed quarantine measures for those returning from vacation.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.7: But the regulation applies to those who are on vacation starting on the cut-off date, which is Saturday August 1, and it was not introduced overnight.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.8: Incidentally, Austria has considered Spain as one of the “safe countries” to date, and does not require any quarantine upon returning to Austria.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.9: “Countless ministers must have known in advance that it was possible that a quarantine would be imposed for people vacationing in Spain,” commented the Labor representative Diane Abbot.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.10: “But apparently no one made the effort to tell Grant Schapps.”
wienerzeitung.at.136148.11: Less than a month after the end of the coronavirus state of emergency in Spain and the expiration of the strict lockdown, the number of infections in the country is rising again.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.12: Virologists are pinning the recent spread on night life above all.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.13: Spain is one of the most popular vacation countries among Brits.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.14: The British government is advising against traveling to the Spanish mainland unless necessary, excluding the Canary Islands and Balearic Islands, which are particularly popular among British tourists.
wienerzeitung.at.136148.15: To date, more than 272,000 infections with the novel coronavirus and more than 28,000 deaths have been registered in Spain.
mz-web.de.376126.1: Russia: Navy Day: Putin announces hypersonic weapons for warships
mz-web.de.376126.2: On Navy Day in his country, Russian President Vladimir Putin has announced that warships will be equipped with the latest hypersonic weapons.
mz-web.de.376126.3: These weapons, a world first, would increase the Russian naval forces’ fighting options, said Putin in St. Petersburg on Sunday at the central navy parade.
mz-web.de.376126.4: Afterwards the Defence Ministry also notified the Interfax agency that the Zirkon hypersonic missiles built for the navy had been tested successfully.
mz-web.de.376126.5: The hypersonic weapons have a speed of around 343 meters per second, many times faster than the speed of sound.
mz-web.de.376126.6: They are regarded as weapons of the future.
mz-web.de.376126.8: It is said that the Poseidon underwater torpedo, to which atomic warheads can be fitted, is still being developed.
mz-web.de.376126.9: The planned underwater drone is aimed at destroying coastal targets.
mz-web.de.376126.10: The President, who also rode in a military boat, said that in this year alone, 40 new ships would come into service for the largest country in the world’s various naval units.
mz-web.de.376126.11: Russia has a larger coastal area than any other country in the world.
mz-web.de.376126.12: The navy has reliably protected Russia for 300 years, said Putin on the day celebrated by sailors throughout the country.
mz-web.de.376126.13: Naval forces at many other Russian coastal locations also celebrated the day with parades.
mz-web.de.376126.14: In Syria, where Russia is fighting beside ruler Bashar al-Assad, the military demonstrated its strength with a weapons display in the Mediterranean port of Tartus.
mz-web.de.376126.16: In a video released by the Defense Ministry, not only warships, including a submarine, were visible, but also combat helicopters and jets.
tt.com.149061.1: Hurricane “Hanna” reaches Texas: Aid impeded by coronavirus
tt.com.149061.2: Washington - The first hurricane of the season over the Atlantic has made landfall in Texas.
tt.com.149061.3: Life-threatening flooding, strong winds and heavy rainfall are now threatening parts of the US state, announced the National Hurricane Center of the US climate authority NOAA Saturday night (local time).
tt.com.149061.4: Governor Greg Abbott declared a state of emergency for numerous counties.
tt.com.149061.5: The coronavirus pandemic raging in Texas made work difficult for aid workers, Abbott said, according to US media.
tt.com.149061.7: “Every hurricane is a tremendous challenge,” Abbott said according to the newspaper “Houston Chronicle.”
tt.com.149061.8: With regard to the hurricane in Texas, he added: “This challenge is complicated and is exacerbated when you consider that it is sweeping through an area that is the most heavily hit by Covid-19 in the state.”
tt.com.149061.9: According to Johns-Hopkins University, around 5,000 people have died in Texas alone as a result of the coronavirus pandemic.
tt.com.149061.10: Abbott called on people who had to leave their homes to be cautious.
tt.com.149061.11: They should observe practices “that we have gotten used to,” such as wearing masks, said the governor according to the channel CBS.
tt.com.149061.12: It is important that everyone maintains social distance.
tt.com.149061.13: That is why hotel rooms have also been provided in some locations.
tt.com.149061.14: In addition, coronavirus testing is to be performed in emergency lodging.
tt.com.149061.15: Damage was initially only reported from the coastal city of Port Mansfield.
tt.com.149061.17: With wind speeds of up to 150 km/h, “Hanna” made landfall on Padre Island right in front of the Texan coast, according to authorities.
tt.com.149061.18: The tropical storm was upgraded to the lowest level hurricane just before this.
tt.com.149061.19: For the coastal section from Port Mansfield to Sargent, a storm surge warning was initially issued and then later retracted.
tt.com.149061.20: Authorities expected the storm to weaken as “Hanna” moves further inland and head towards northeastern Mexico.
tt.com.149061.22: In the Pacific, hurricane “Douglas” was on the move Saturday night at wind speeds of around 150 km/h heading towards Hawaii.
tt.com.149061.23: The Hurricane Center, however, expected the hurricane to weaken further.
tt.com.149061.24: Models predict it should be near to the largest Hawaiian island on Sunday (local time) - but then it will be a storm, just before the hurricane threshold.
tt.com.149061.25: NOAA expected a more active hurricane season over the Atlantic than average this year, according to a forecast from May.
tt.com.149061.26: Up to ten hurricanes are expected from June to the end of November, six of which could become very strong, authorities stated.
tt.com.149061.27: On average, there are six hurricanes over the Atlantic per year, while three of them develop into severe storms.
tt.com.149061.28: Given the available climate data and the higher water temperature in the Atlantic and Caribbean, the probability of a normal season is only 30 percent and the probability of a below-average season is just 10 percent, information says.
tt.com.149061.29: US president Donald Trump wrote on Twitter that his administration was observing the storms closely and he is in contact with the affected states.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.1: Four goals denied: Video Assistant Referee “penalizes” Sassuolo
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.2: Sassuolo’s Filip Djuricic was denied two goals
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.3: Naples - Four goals scored, four goals denied: Sassuolo Calcio had a dark evening with 0:2 (0:1) at the SSC Naples in the Italian soccer league Serie A - and was really mad at the VAR.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.4: “A festival of disallowed goals for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.5: VAR has never been so hard on a team,” commented the “Corriere dello Sport.”
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.6: Host Naples took the lead in the 8th minute with a goal from wing back Elseid Hisaj, in the 32nd minute Filip Djuricic initially celebrated the equalizer.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.7: The video assistant referee (VAR) withdrew the goal due to an offside position.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.8: Five minutes later, Djuricic shot the ball into the back of the net again - and again the VAR intervened.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.9: The goals from striker Francesco Caputo (50th minute) and Domenico Berardi (61st minute) were withdrawn by the team of referees at the VAR’s instruction.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.10: During injury time, Allan shot the final 2:0 score for Naples, cementing the bitter evening for Sassuolo.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.11: “VAR is worse for Sassuolo than a radar trap on the road and punishes Sassuolo like no other team before.
usinger-anzeiger.de.246516.12: The new technology set records,” writes the “Gazzetta dello Sport.”
wn.de.700404.2: Munich (dpa) - Initial preparations for the Champions League began with a blow for two-time winner FC Bayern.
wn.de.700404.3: Hansi Flick, who had recovered “relatively well” after a short vacation and few training days, must already be wondering after the first team training how he can rebuild his successful defense after the injury to world champion Benjamin Pavard.
wn.de.700404.4: The Frenchman, who has the third-most play time behind captain Manuel Neuer and midfielder Joshua Kimmich, suffered a torn ligament on his left tarsal and could miss crucial top class duels.
wn.de.700404.5: In the lousy Munich weather, the right defender broke off a training game and was carted off the field.
wn.de.700404.6: It remains to be seen how long the unrestricted regular player will have to take off from the battle for the title.
wn.de.700404.7: It will be tough to play in the quarter finals against FC Chelsea on August 8, but the 24 year old can hope for the final tournament starting in Lisbon on August 12.
wn.de.700404.8: But Bavarians don’t want be stopped from training by the bad luck on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.9: Flick named the three attributes he wants to see from his stars on the way to the Portuguese capital in his personal triple formula.
wn.de.700404.10: His hungry for victory title-winners should demonstrate quality, intensity and concentration on the (ideally) 28-day route to the top class final game on August 23.
wn.de.700404.11: “Quite simply, we have excellently mastered the necessary tasks for the Championship and the Cup.
wn.de.700404.12: Now it’s time to do something special,” says Flick.
wn.de.700404.13: But before the Munich team can start to specifically think about the final tournament and a training camp on the Algarve before that, they first have to face FC Chelsea in the quarter finals.
wn.de.700404.14: After the 3:0 in the first leg before the coronavirus break, the Londoners may not again become a Bavarian nightmare in the home arena like in the lost “Finale Dahoam” [final at home] in 2012.
wn.de.700404.15: “First we have to walk through the door.
wn.de.700404.16: We want to win, create good conditions and fill up our confidence with a good game,” requires Flick.
wn.de.700404.17: They will be tested on Friday against Olympique Marseille.
wn.de.700404.18: In a long speech, Flick committed his stars, who had 13 days off after the double, to a unique August.
wn.de.700404.19: He welcomed 31 players to Säbener Straße, including precious addition Leroy Sané, who was meeting all his new colleagues on the field after switching from Manchester City.
wn.de.700404.20: “Leroy has fit in well like all new guys,” reported Flick.
wn.de.700404.21: But instead of talking about the new season when Sané and company will no longer be able to just train, Flick preferred to talk about the current title project of the German series champions.
wn.de.700404.22: After days of training individually and in small groups, they will now train as a full team to prepare for the Londoners, who unlike Flick’s ensemble are already in the game rhythm.
wn.de.700404.23: After that, the Munich team could face a quarter final against FC Barcelona and Lionel Messi, and in the semi-finals the possible opponents are Real Madrid, Manchester City or Juventus Turin.
wn.de.700404.24: The path to the final in Lisbon “is not that easy,” emphasized the head coach, who can rely on the services of his new assistant-in-training Miroslav Klose, starting on Tuesday.
wn.de.700404.25: The world championship record goal scorer and Flick know what matters when going from 0-100 from preparing for so many tournaments.
wn.de.700404.26: With his current team, the work is “a delight,” praises Flick.
wn.de.700404.27: The “focus on winning” is an impressive characteristic of his team.
wn.de.700404.28: They excitedly competed with nine-man teams on Sunday.
wn.de.700404.29: All of the performers were there, including Thiago, who wants to leave, and defender David Alaba, who is not guaranteed to stay beyond the Champions League season.
salzburg.com.306641.1: Formula 1 needs a special rule to crown its world champion
salzburg.com.306641.2: Since the required number of continents cannot be driven on, the FIA needs to improvise to award the world champion title.
salzburg.com.306641.3: All American races have been cancelled.
salzburg.com.306641.4: The race calendar is becoming more concrete
salzburg.com.306641.5: The race calendar for the current Formula 1 season continues to take shape.
salzburg.com.306641.6: Three more race tracks were added this week to the ten confirmed Grand Prix so far.
salzburg.com.306641.7: There will be races on the Nürburgring in Germany and in Portimão in Portugal in October.
salzburg.com.306641.8: On November 1, Lewis Hamilton and company will battle it out for world championship points on the traditional Italian route in Imola.
salzburg.com.306641.9: The 2020 race calendar includes 13 circuits as it stands.
salzburg.com.306641.10: “We are looking forward making further progress in setting our plans for the 2020 season,” said Formula 1 boss Chase Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.11: In total, 15 to 18 races should be completed in the elite class of motor sports in this unusual season.
salzburg.com.306641.12: Then Formula 1 will end its season in Asia.
salzburg.com.306641.13: The final race calendar should be set and published in the coming weeks.
salzburg.com.306641.14: Of the races in Bahrain and Abu Dhabi in December that have already been homed in on, media reports state that there could also be races in Vietnam and Malaysia at the end of November.
salzburg.com.306641.15: Rules require races on three continents
salzburg.com.306641.16: The Formula 1 rules require at least one race on three continents to win the world championship.
salzburg.com.306641.17: Even if, as currently planned, races can only be held on two continents, there needs to be a world champion.
salzburg.com.306641.18: The FIA wants to use a special rule to award the title, invoking “exceptional circumstances” due to the coronavirus pandemic.
salzburg.com.306641.19: The traditional start of the season in Australia in March had to be cancelled at short notice due to the looming coronavirus crisis.
salzburg.com.306641.20: It won’t be possible to return to the continent this year.
salzburg.com.306641.21: In addition, Formula 1 won’t be invited to America this year.
salzburg.com.306641.22: Cancellation met with criticism in Brazil
salzburg.com.306641.23: The races in Canada, the US, Mexico and Brazil will not take place due to the fraught coronavirus situation.
salzburg.com.306641.24: “We are looking forward to being with you again next season,” says Carey.
salzburg.com.306641.25: The cancellation of the American races was met with criticism above all in Brazil: “For us, the cancellation is not surprising, but we cannot accept the reasons for this,” said Tamas Rohonyi, promoter of the Grand Prix in São Paulo.
salzburg.com.306641.26: The infection rates in the São Paulo region are much lower than in other regions in Brazil.
salzburg.com.306641.27: Some teams’ concerns of not wanting to drive in Brazil would also not justify a cancellation.
salzburg.com.306641.28: They are ready for the required safety measures.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.1: Greta Thunberg: Mad look at Donald Trump goes around the world
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.2: Greta Thunberg spoke about her encounter with US president Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.3: Greta Thunberg was a guest on Stephen Colbert’s late night show via video chat and revealed in the interview what she was thinking when she met Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.4: Climate activist Greta Thunberg was a guest on the popular US late night show via video chat.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.5: Among other things, she spoke about her struggle against powerful people in the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.6: The teenager also talked about her famous “mad look” during her encounter with Donald Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.7: New York City - In the past two years, climate activist Greta Thunberg has made a name for herself with her tireless efforts for the “Fridays For Future” movement.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.8: Now in a popular late night show, she spoke about her future plans as well as her encounter with the US president Donald Trump at the UN Climate Summit last year.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.9: Late night moderator Stephen Colbert welcomed 17-year old Thunberg to his show on Tuesday and conducted a longer interview with the Swede.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.10: Not only did she talk about her fight against climate change, but also her conflict with the powerful in the world.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.11: “There are some things that surprised me,” she said.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.12: “How far people go to distract from the climate crisis,” she stated.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.13: She said she has experienced “everything from organized hate campaigns to threats, just because a group of kids take to the streets.”
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.14: She thinks heads of state and leading politicians who make fun of her on social media or even try to silence her are “funny,” because their reactions show that “they don’t have any other response.”
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.15: Things got particularly interesting at the end of the interview when Greta Thunberg was asked about a famous scene in which she threw a mean look at the US president Trump.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.16: At the UN Climate Summit 2019 in New York, for which the activist sailed across the Atlantic, her expressive look was captured by the cameras and has since been viewed by countless people on the Internet.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.17: A GIF was made of the short clip, which finally became one of the most used images for Trump opponents.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.18: But what was the 17-year old thinking in this moment about the US president?
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.19: She only answered briefly and dryly to the question from Stephen Colbert, which she is asked often;: “To be honest, I don’t think you need an explanation.”
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.20: The experienced satirist Colbert certainly wasn’t expecting the response and briefly disappeared from view laughing.
soester-anzeiger.de.151520.21: Many at the climate conference will remember her for her “How dare you?” speech about the principles of climate protection.
morgenpost.de.276366.1: Former Dortmund player Immobile scores hat trick for Lazio Rome
morgenpost.de.276366.2: In the race for Europe’s Golden Boot, Ciro Immobile is now level with Bayern’s Robert Lewandowski.
morgenpost.de.276366.3: Former Dortmund player Ciro Immobile still has a very good chance of being the top scorer in the Italian league.
morgenpost.de.276366.4: The one-time BVB star scored three in Lazio’s 5:1 (1:1) victory over Hellas Verona, including two penalties in additional time in each half.
morgenpost.de.276366.5: Now, with two games left in the season for the club who are currently fourth in the table, the 30 year old has 34 goals to his name- exactly as many as Robert Lewandowski scored last season in the Bundesliga for Bayern Munich.
morgenpost.de.276366.6: In Italy, Cristiano Ronaldo follows with 30 goals so far, the Portuguese superstar having scored for the league leaders in the evening against Sampdoria Genoa.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.1: Fleetwood Mac co-founder Peter Green dies
mittelbayerische.de.307290.2: His life was like a roller coaster ride: after a swift ascent with Fleetwood Mac, things went sharply downhill and then slowly upwards again.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.3: Now blues-rock guitarist Peter Green has died at the age of 73.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.4: Genial guitarist, junkie, cult follower: The co-founder of band Fleetwood Mac, Peter Green, is dead.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.5: He died peacefully in his sleep at the age of 73, reported family members on Saturday in an official announcement, with a further announcement to come in the next few days.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.6: Leading musicians such as Peter Frampton recognized Green as one of the best blues and rock guitarists.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.7: In an emotional reaction, Mick Fleetwood spoke of a “monumental loss” for all former and current members of Fleetwood Mac.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.8: Drummer Fleetwood and guitarist Green founded the legendary group in London in 1967, and their dreamy instrumental hit “Albatross” has never been forgotten.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.9: The musician’s ("The End Of The Game", "In The Skies") life resembled a roller coaster ride.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.10: Green experienced a dramatic rise with Fleetwood Mac - but the group then enjoyed its greatest successes without him.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.11: It is said that one dispute occurred because Green wanted to donate all of the band’s earnings to good causes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.12: He began to perform in flowing robes and with a large crucifix.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.13: Psychological problems are also said to have played a part.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.14: Green left the band three years after it was formed, in 1970.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.16: The blues-rock guitarist suffered from drug abuse and schizophrenia, biographers reported.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.17: For a long time Green received psychiatric treatment.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.18: The musician vanished into thin air for a large part of the 1970s.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.19: It is said that he sometimes lived on the streets, worked as a gardener in a cemetery, and spent some time on a kibbutz in Israel.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.20: Green was born in 1946, the son of a Jewish working-class family in the London district of Bethnal Green.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.21: Even when he was young he loved American blues musicians like B.B. King and Muddy Waters.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.22: He learned his first guitar chords when he was eleven.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.23: At the age of 15 the teenager began playing the guitar professionally and five years later he got the chance to take the stage as the lead guitarist for instrumental band Peter B’s Looners.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.24: A little later he was hired by the Bluesbreakers as the replacement for his idol Eric Clapton.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.25: In the summer of 1967, in the middle of the blues boom, Green founded Fleetwood Mac along with his Bluesbreaker co-members Mick Fleetwood and John McVie.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.26: The song “Albatross”, composed by Green, brought the group their first number 1 hit in the winter of 1968/69, and catapulted them to the top of the British music scene.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.27: But soon the rapid ascent showed its darker sides - Green was unable to cope with the media hype and his experiments with LSD grew increasingly extreme.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.28: Later, in an interview, he commented on life between music and addiction, “The worst thing that has happened to me in my life is the drugs; the best was landing a number 1 hit”.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.29: Towards the end of the decade, in 1979, Green surprisingly had a notable success with an album inspired by religious themes.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.30: Meanwhile, without him, Fleetwood Mac were swimming on a wave of success with a new line-up.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.31: Their album “Rumours”, released in 1977, sold over 40 million copies worldwide.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.32: Despite various minor solo successes, Green did not achieve any major comeback until he started afresh with a group of his musician friends in 1996.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.33: At the time, Britain’s “Daily Telegraph” spoke of a rock star that had come back down to earth.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.34: Free of drugs, Green and the Peter Green Splinter Group released various albums before the band split up in 2004.
mittelbayerische.de.307290.35: For music experts he was a blues legend even in his own lifetime - and with his gentle sound he was one of the most influential guitarists of recent decades.
